Idiomatic_Sent: 大名鼎鼎的曹操曹孟德千里迢迢、风尘仆仆地来到京城，口口声声说是来保护皇帝的，引得大家议论纷纷。
en_meaning: over a long distance, a great journey
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '大名鼎鼎的曹操曹孟德千里迢迢、风尘仆仆地来到京城，口口声声说是来保护皇帝的，引得大家议论纷纷。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The renowned Cao Cao, also known as Cao Mengde, traveled a long and dusty journey to the capital, claiming to be there to protect the emperor, which sparked much discussion among the people.
English_Sentence_4o: The renowned Cao Cao, also known as Cao Mengde, traveled a great distance and arrived in the capital city, claiming repeatedly that he was there to protect the emperor, which led to widespread discussion.

Idiomatic_Sent: 他的做法虽然取得了一定效果，但其实投机取巧，不足为训。
en_meaning: Not worth mentioning or not worth teaching
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '他的做法虽然取得了一定效果，但其实投机取巧，不足为训。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Although his approach has achieved some results, in fact, it is opportunistic and not worthy of emulation.
English_Sentence_4o: "Although his approach has had some effect, it is actually opportunistic and not worth emulating."

Idiomatic_Sent: 在这个蓝色的星球上，在我们没有见过的远方，生存着各色各样的人，无论再小的角落，有人的地方，就有梦想。 #绿亦歌#
en_meaning: various types; all sorts of
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '在这个蓝色的星球上，在我们没有见过的远方，生存着各色各样的人，无论再小的角落，有人的地方，就有梦想。 #绿亦歌#'
English_Sentence_3.5: On this blue planet, in the distant places we have never seen, there are all kinds of people, and wherever there are people, there are dreams. #GreenAlsoSings#
English_Sentence_4o: On this blue planet, in distant places we have never seen, live all kinds of people. No matter how small the corner, wherever there are people, there are dreams. #TheSongofGreen#

Idiomatic_Sent: 想要在短时间内把一本厚书看完，提纲挈领的阅读方式是必须的。
en_meaning: to give a clear and concise summary or outline
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '想要在短时间内把一本厚书看完，提纲挈领的阅读方式是必须的。'
English_Sentence_3.5: To finish reading a thick book in a short period of time, it is necessary to read with a clear outline.
English_Sentence_4o: 'If you want to finish reading a thick book in a short time, a skimming and scanning reading method is essential.'

Idiomatic_Sent: 以苏格兰分权机构破绽百出的托辞和英国政府见利忘义的政治策略看来迈格拉希可能是受益者。但是无论是粉饰太平的人道主义说法还是缺乏远见的政治阴谋释放他都是错误的做法。
en_meaning: to forget one's principles or sense of loyalty when faced with personal gain
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '以苏格兰分权机构破绽百出的托辞和英国政府见利忘义的政治策略看来迈格拉希可能是受益者。但是无论是粉饰太平的人道主义说法还是缺乏远见的政治阴谋释放他都是错误的做法。'
English_Sentence_3.5: It seems that Magrahi may be the beneficiary of Scotland's flawed devolution scheme and the UK government's opportunistic political strategy. However, it is wrong to release him, whether under the guise of humanitarianism or short-sighted political conspiracy.
English_Sentence_4o: Judging by the flawed excuses of the Scottish devolved institutions and the British government's opportunistic political strategies, al-Megrahi may have been a beneficiary. However, whether it is the humanitarian pretense to cover up the situation or the shortsighted political conspiracy, releasing him was a mistake.

Idiomatic_Sent: 工作压力，废寝忘食，日夜颠倒，尔虞我诈，费尽心机。不仅如此，生命有时处于一种荒废和停滞之中。物质的现实世界，反复颠扑之后，剩余下独处时难明的一种焦躁和失落。 #安妮宝贝#
en_meaning: to use every trick in the book
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '工作压力，废寝忘食，日夜颠倒，尔虞我诈，费尽心机。不仅如此，生命有时处于一种荒废和停滞之中。物质的现实世界，反复颠扑之后，剩余下独处时难明的一种焦躁和失落。 #安妮宝贝#'
English_Sentence_3.5: Work pressure, sacrificing sleep and meals, flipping day and night, engaging in deceitful schemes, exhausting mental efforts. Not only that, life sometimes falls into a state of neglect and stagnation. After repeated struggles in the material world, there remains a difficult-to-understand restlessness and loss when alone. #AnnieBaby#
English_Sentence_4o: Work pressure, forgetting to eat and sleep, day and night reversed, deceit and scheming, exhausting every effort. Not only that, life sometimes falls into a state of waste and stagnation. After repeated struggles in the material world, what remains is a kind of anxiety and loss that is hard to understand when alone. #AnnieBaby#

Idiomatic_Sent: 我捋起袖口，将锅凑到水龙头，冲满水，然后张开“如来神掌”先给它来一招“倒转乾坤”，再来招“天昏地暗”，最后来个“荡气回肠”。一番折腾，累得我“气喘如牛”。
en_meaning: pitch darkness
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '我捋起袖口，将锅凑到水龙头，冲满水，然后张开“如来神掌”先给它来一招“倒转乾坤”，再来招“天昏地暗”，最后来个“荡气回肠”。一番折腾，累得我“气喘如牛”。'
English_Sentence_3.5: I rolled up my sleeves, brought the pot to the faucet, filled it with water, then used the "Buddha's Palm" technique to first perform the "Reverse Universe" move, followed by the "Darkening Sky" move, and finally the "Stirring the Heartstrings" move. After all that commotion, I was so exhausted that I was "panting like a bull".
English_Sentence_4o: I rolled up my sleeves, brought the pot to the faucet, filled it with water, then used the "Buddha's Palm" to give it a move called "Reversing Heaven and Earth," followed by "Darkening the Sky," and finally "Soul-Stirring." After all that effort, I was panting like an ox.

Idiomatic_Sent: 它没有华丽的艳装，只彼一身的葱茏。它已抛弃了幻想，却未老气横秋。那燥热蝉鸣的坦怀，那闪电暴雨的洒脱，便构成了夏日特有的性格。你看，她总是坚实而豪放，在自然界中演绎着一个沉重而卓大不空的角色。
en_meaning: being old-fashioned and arrogant
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '它没有华丽的艳装，只彼一身的葱茏。它已抛弃了幻想，却未老气横秋。那燥热蝉鸣的坦怀，那闪电暴雨的洒脱，便构成了夏日特有的性格。你看，她总是坚实而豪放，在自然界中演绎着一个沉重而卓大不空的角色。'
English_Sentence_3.5: It does not have gorgeous attire, only a body of greenery. It has abandoned illusions, yet remains vigorous. The openness of the hot cicada singing, the freedom of lightning and rain, together form the unique character of summer. Look, she is always solid and bold, interpreting a heavy and magnificent role in the natural world.
English_Sentence_4o: "It does not have a glamorous attire, only a lush green appearance. It has abandoned fantasies, yet it is not pretentious. The open-heartedness of the cicadas' hot buzzing, and the unrestrained nature of the lightning and rain, form the unique character of summer. You see, she is always solid and bold, playing a significant and substantial role in nature."

Idiomatic_Sent: 知难而进的决心，锲而不舍的精神，攻坚破难的魄力，切实可行的办法，组织协调的本领。
en_meaning: have the courage to face difficulties and move forward
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '知难而进的决心，锲而不舍的精神，攻坚破难的魄力，切实可行的办法，组织协调的本领。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The determination to face difficulties, the spirit of perseverance, the courage to overcome obstacles, practical solutions, and the ability to organize and coordinate.
English_Sentence_4o: The determination to face difficulties, the perseverance to keep going, the courage to tackle challenges, practical and feasible methods, and the ability to organize and coordinate.

Idiomatic_Sent: 洪水过后，村子里的庄稼荡然无存了。
en_meaning: completely destroyed or wiped out
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '洪水过后，村子里的庄稼荡然无存了。'
English_Sentence_3.5: After the flood, the crops in the village were completely destroyed.
English_Sentence_4o: "After the flood, the crops in the village were completely gone."

Idiomatic_Sent: 平安夜祝福点评语：人品：公平正直。性格：四平八稳。特点：平易近人。家庭：歌舞升平。事业：平步青云。财运：七平八满。健康：心平气定。总结：平安无事。希望：欢若平生。祝你：。
en_meaning: steady and stable in all aspects
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '平安夜祝福点评语：人品：公平正直。性格：四平八稳。特点：平易近人。家庭：歌舞升平。事业：平步青云。财运：七平八满。健康：心平气定。总结：平安无事。希望：欢若平生。祝你：。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Christmas Eve blessings review: Character: fair and upright. Personality: steady and stable. Features: approachable. Family: harmonious. Career: thriving. Financial luck: abundant. Health: calm and composed. Conclusion: peace and safety. Hope: joy as always. Wishing you: peace and happiness.
English_Sentence_4o: Christmas Eve blessing comments: Character: Fair and upright. Personality: Steady and reliable. Traits: Amiable. Family: Peaceful and harmonious. Career: Smooth and successful. Wealth: Sufficient and stable. Health: Calm and composed. Summary: Safe and sound. Hope: Joyful as ever. Wishing you:.

Idiomatic_Sent: 感情，也要棋逢对手才能缠绵缱倦。 #独木舟#
en_meaning: encountering a capable opponent
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '感情，也要棋逢对手才能缠绵缱倦。 #独木舟#'
English_Sentence_3.5: 'Emotions need a worthy opponent to be entangled and linger.' #canoe#
English_Sentence_4o: "Love, too, requires a worthy opponent to be truly entangled in passion. #Canoe#"

Idiomatic_Sent: 蹉跎了岁月，也蹉跎了我们的心，但我们的意志是坚定的，你是我倾慕的海，是我义无返顾奔赴的海，是至死不变爱着的海！
en_meaning: remain unwaveringly loyal or committed till death
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '蹉跎了岁月，也蹉跎了我们的心，但我们的意志是坚定的，你是我倾慕的海，是我义无返顾奔赴的海，是至死不变爱着的海！'
English_Sentence_3.5: The years have been wasted, our hearts have been wasted, but our determination is firm. You are the sea I admire, the sea I will rush to without hesitation, the sea I will love until death!
English_Sentence_4o: "Wasted years have also wasted our hearts, but our will is resolute; you are the sea I admire, the sea I rush towards without hesitation, the sea I love unchangingly until death!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 滕王阁修建在重峦叠嶂之间，因地制宜，美不胜收，是四大名楼之一。
en_meaning: breathtakingly beautiful, to the point that it is beyond words
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '滕王阁修建在重峦叠嶂之间，因地制宜，美不胜收，是四大名楼之一。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The Tengwang Pavilion is built among towering mountains and winding peaks, tailored to the local conditions, and is incredibly beautiful, making it one of the four famous towers.
English_Sentence_4o: "Tengwang Pavilion is built among a series of overlapping mountain ranges, adapting to the local conditions, and is exceptionally beautiful, being one of the Four Great Towers."

Idiomatic_Sent: 难怪信长在得到美浓以后，马上就把居城迁到这里，更是改为岐阜，使用‘天下布武’印，进而腾飞，迅速席卷天下。
en_meaning: "sweep across the world", referring to something or someone exerting a tremendous influence or impact on a global scale
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '难怪信长在得到美浓以后，马上就把居城迁到这里，更是改为岐阜，使用‘天下布武’印，进而腾飞，迅速席卷天下。'
English_Sentence_3.5: No wonder after Nobunaga received Mino, he immediately moved his residence here, changed it to Gifu, used the 'Heavenly Military' seal, and quickly swept through the world.
English_Sentence_4o: "No wonder Nobunaga, after acquiring Mino, immediately moved his residence here, renamed it Gifu, used the seal 'Tenka Fubu,' and then soared, quickly sweeping across the land."

Idiomatic_Sent: 择善而从，是超越了所有的代价。
en_meaning: choose the good and follow it
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '择善而从，是超越了所有的代价。'
English_Sentence_3.5: To choose the good and follow it is to surpass all costs.
English_Sentence_4o: "Choose what is good and follow it, transcending all costs."

Idiomatic_Sent: 自从我跨入小学的大门以来，我上过许许多多的课，有生动活泼的语文课，有妙趣横生的数学课，还有奥妙无穷的自然课。
en_meaning: lively and vivacious
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '自从我跨入小学的大门以来，我上过许许多多的课，有生动活泼的语文课，有妙趣横生的数学课，还有奥妙无穷的自然课。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Since I stepped through the gates of elementary school, I have taken many different classes, including lively Chinese classes, interesting math classes, and mysterious natural science classes.
English_Sentence_4o: Since I entered elementary school, I have attended many classes, including lively language classes, fascinating math classes, and endlessly intriguing science classes.

Idiomatic_Sent: 在春风刚吹起的时节，绿油油的稻子昂首挺胸，颇有少年狂气，随着风的指挥左右摇摆；他曾经历过阳光雨露，也曾经历过暴风骤雨，但柔软的茎却未被折断，待秋天来到他饱含稻穗的头就悄然低下，那里面充满了智慧和感悟。
en_meaning: violent and sudden storm or situation
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '在春风刚吹起的时节，绿油油的稻子昂首挺胸，颇有少年狂气，随着风的指挥左右摇摆；他曾经历过阳光雨露，也曾经历过暴风骤雨，但柔软的茎却未被折断，待秋天来到他饱含稻穗的头就悄然低下，那里面充满了智慧和感悟。'
English_Sentence_3.5: In the season when the spring breeze just started blowing, the lush green rice plants stood tall and proud, exuding a youthful vigor, swaying left and right as directed by the wind; they have experienced sunshine and rain, as well as storms, but their supple stems remain unbroken. As autumn arrives, their heads, filled with rice grains, quietly bow down, brimming with wisdom and insight.
English_Sentence_4o: In the season when the spring breeze just begins to blow, the lush green rice plants stand tall and proud, full of youthful exuberance, swaying with the wind's command; they have experienced sunshine and rain, as well as storms, but their soft stems have not been broken. When autumn arrives, their heads heavy with grains quietly bow down, filled with wisdom and insight.

Idiomatic_Sent: 对日寇的进犯，军民们早已森严壁垒，严阵以待。也作“壁垒森严”。
en_meaning: having a strict and formidable defense; also refers to a situation where there are many obstacles or barriers to overcome
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '对日寇的进犯，军民们早已森严壁垒，严阵以待。也作“壁垒森严”。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The military and civilians have already built up a strong defense against the Japanese invaders, standing ready for battle. Also known as "fortress-like defenses".
English_Sentence_4o: "To counter the invasion of the Japanese aggressors, the military and civilians have long established impregnable defenses and are in full battle readiness. Also expressed as 'impregnable defenses'."

Idiomatic_Sent: 雄鹰追求在万里无云的蓝天下展翅高飞；猎豹追求在一望无际的草原上飞快奔跑；鱼儿追求在波澜壮阔的大海中自由自在地游泳。
en_meaning: endless and boundless, stretching as far as the eye can see
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '雄鹰追求在万里无云的蓝天下展翅高飞；猎豹追求在一望无际的草原上飞快奔跑；鱼儿追求在波澜壮阔的大海中自由自在地游泳。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The eagle pursues soaring high in the cloudless blue sky for thousands of miles; the cheetah pursues running swiftly across the boundless grassland; the fish pursues swimming freely in the vast and turbulent ocean.
English_Sentence_4o: "The eagle aspires to soar high in the cloudless blue sky; the cheetah strives to sprint swiftly across the boundless grasslands; the fish seek to swim freely in the vast, rolling ocean."

Idiomatic_Sent: 她默默地投身于创作，从不追求名利，就如此孑然一身地走完人生，但却活在众多读者的心中。
en_meaning: being alone or solitary
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '她默默地投身于创作，从不追求名利，就如此孑然一身地走完人生，但却活在众多读者的心中。'
English_Sentence_3.5: She quietly devoted herself to creation, never seeking fame or fortune, and walked through life alone, yet living on in the hearts of many readers.
English_Sentence_4o: Silently, she devoted herself to creation, never seeking fame or fortune, living her life alone but residing in the hearts of many readers.

Idiomatic_Sent: 天地会在漳厦和台湾地区扎根最深，举凡海陆运输、码头货栈、大小施工的行当被垄断了一半以上，甚至连官衙修堤造府，天地会都嘻皮笑脸的接工程、赚银子。
en_meaning: smiling and fawning
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '天地会在漳厦和台湾地区扎根最深，举凡海陆运输、码头货栈、大小施工的行当被垄断了一半以上，甚至连官衙修堤造府，天地会都嘻皮笑脸的接工程、赚银子。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The Heaven and Earth Society has the deepest roots in the Zhangzhou-Xiamen and Taiwan regions, monopolizing over half of various industries such as maritime and land transportation, dockyards, warehouses, and construction. They even jovially accept government projects like repairing embankments and building mansions to make money.
English_Sentence_4o: "The Tiandihui had the deepest roots in the Zhang-Xia and Taiwan regions, monopolizing more than half of the businesses related to land and sea transportation, docks, and warehouses, as well as large and small construction projects. They even cheekily took on contracts for government projects like repairing dikes and building offices, making money in the process."

Idiomatic_Sent: 一天之计在于“辰”，辰时好光阴。吉祥壬辰年，生活有点甜。挑吉日良辰，干劲十足向前奔。邀日月星辰，赏美景良辰。龙年启程，龙马精神，祝马到功成！
en_meaning: achieve success immediately and effortlessly
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '一天之计在于“辰”，辰时好光阴。吉祥壬辰年，生活有点甜。挑吉日良辰，干劲十足向前奔。邀日月星辰，赏美景良辰。龙年启程，龙马精神，祝马到功成！'
English_Sentence_3.5: A day's plan is in the "hour of 辰", as the hour of 辰 brings good time. In the auspicious year of Renchen, life is a little sweet. Choose an auspicious day and hour, and move forward with full energy. Invite the sun, moon, and stars, and enjoy the beautiful scenery. Setting off in the year of the Dragon, with the spirit of the dragon and horse, wishing success upon arrival!
English_Sentence_4o: "The plan of the day lies in the morning; morning time is good time. In the auspicious Year of the Water Dragon, life is a bit sweet. Choose a lucky day and time, and move forward with full vigor. Invite the sun, moon, and stars to enjoy beautiful moments. Set out in the Year of the Dragon with the spirit of the dragon and horse, and may you achieve success swiftly!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 让我们像勇敢的海燕，勇敢如诗，无视风雨的挑衅；让我们像勇敢的霍金，勇敢如风，改写生命的诗歌，让我们像那无边无际的大海，把自己的波澜壮阔献给世间！
en_meaning: a grand and magnificent sight or scene
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '让我们像勇敢的海燕，勇敢如诗，无视风雨的挑衅；让我们像勇敢的霍金，勇敢如风，改写生命的诗歌，让我们像那无边无际的大海，把自己的波澜壮阔献给世间！'
English_Sentence_3.5: Let us be brave like the fearless petrel, brave like poetry, ignoring the challenges of wind and rain; let us be brave like the fearless Hawking, brave like the wind, rewriting the poetry of life, let us be like the boundless ocean, offering our vast waves to the world!
English_Sentence_4o: "Let us be like the brave sea swallows, courageous as poetry, defying the provocation of storms; let us be like the brave Hawking, courageous as the wind, rewriting the poem of life; let us be like the boundless ocean, dedicating our vast and magnificent waves to the world!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 记事文不能只按事情的发展顺序，平铺直叙地写下来。
en_meaning: presenting information in a straightforward and sequential manner
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '记事文不能只按事情的发展顺序，平铺直叙地写下来。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Narratives should not be written just following the chronological order of events in a straightforward manner.
English_Sentence_4o: "Descriptive essays cannot be written in a straightforward manner merely following the chronological order of events."

Idiomatic_Sent: 童心是个宝，让我们共同呵护！做孩子的良师益友，与孩子共同成长！
en_meaning: Good teacher and helpful friend
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '童心是个宝，让我们共同呵护！做孩子的良师益友，与孩子共同成长！'
English_Sentence_3.5: Childhood innocence is precious, let us protect it together! Be a good mentor and friend to children, and grow together with them!
English_Sentence_4o: "A child's heart is a treasure, let us nurture it together! Be a good mentor and friend to children, and grow together with them!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 诚心不曾感天动地，誓言没有惊天动地，爱情没有欢天喜地，人生不求经天纬地，只想和你谈天说地，哪怕经历冰天雪地，你嫁给我谢天谢地，和你一起写下幸福的铺天盖地。
en_meaning: extremely happy or joyful
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '诚心不曾感天动地，誓言没有惊天动地，爱情没有欢天喜地，人生不求经天纬地，只想和你谈天说地，哪怕经历冰天雪地，你嫁给我谢天谢地，和你一起写下幸福的铺天盖地。'

Idiomatic_Sent: 他本来是一个很高明的司机，却偏偏在人烟稀少、道路平垣的地方出了事故，这真是所谓“骑驴觅驴”。

English_Sentence_4o: He was originally a very skilled driver, yet he had an accident in a sparsely populated, flat area, which is truly what they call "looking for a donkey while riding one."

Idiomatic_Sent: 在市场经济还不完善的情况下，市场上免不了出现泥沙俱下、鱼龙混杂的现象，只要我们加强管理，就能把假冒伪劣产品逐步消灭干净。

Idiomatic_Sent: 我们已经有太多法律条文和规定了，但是知法犯法的情况还是屡禁不止，所以我认为核心问题是法律的执行，而不是法律的制定。

English_Sentence_4o: "We already have too many laws and regulations, but cases of knowing the law and breaking it still persist, so I believe the core issue is the enforcement of the law, not the making of the law."

I am turning back. Turning back is starting strong but ending weak, and may be ridiculed, but I do not care. #Hu Lancheng#

Idiomatic_Sent: 我要与你携手共度人生，相亲相爱白头偕老。
en_meaning: mutually loving and caring
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '我要与你携手共度人生，相亲相爱白头偕老。'
English_Sentence_3.5: I want to hold hands with you and spend our lives together, loving and growing old together.
English_Sentence_4o: I want to walk through life hand in hand with you, loving each other and growing old together.

Idiomatic_Sent: 为了人民的利益，我赴汤蹈火在所不辞！
en_meaning: willing to undertake any task without hesitation
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '为了人民的利益，我赴汤蹈火在所不辞！'
English_Sentence_3.5: For the sake of the people's interests, I will not hesitate to brave any danger!
English_Sentence_4o: "For the benefit of the people, I will go through fire and water without hesitation!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 栋梁本着继承和发扬相结合，古为今用，兼收并蓄的精神。
en_meaning: to apply ancient principles in contemporary situations
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '栋梁本着继承和发扬相结合，古为今用，兼收并蓄的精神。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The pillar carries on the spirit of inheritance and promotion, applying ancient principles to modern situations, and incorporating a wide range of ideas.
English_Sentence_4o: "Dongliang adheres to the spirit of combining inheritance and development, using the past for the present, and embracing a wide range of ideas."

Idiomatic_Sent: 在保密部门工作一定要谨言慎行，避免瓜田李下之嫌。
en_meaning: be cautious in words and actions, be careful in what you say and do
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '在保密部门工作一定要谨言慎行，避免瓜田李下之嫌。'
English_Sentence_3.5: When working in a secure department, one must be cautious in their speech and actions to avoid suspicion.
English_Sentence_4o: "When working in a confidential department, one must be cautious in words and actions to avoid any suspicion of misconduct."

Idiomatic_Sent: 甭管出自于什么原因，枉费心机是谋吗?阿弄觉得，每一个反思这个问题的人心里很快就会闪现一个正确的答案。
en_meaning: wasting one's effort and scheming in vain
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '甭管出自于什么原因，枉费心机是谋吗?阿弄觉得，每一个反思这个问题的人心里很快就会闪现一个正确的答案。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Regardless of the reasons behind it, is it a waste of effort to scheme? Ah Nong believes that everyone who reflects on this question will quickly come up with the right answer in their hearts.
English_Sentence_4o: No matter the reason, is it scheming in vain? Anong believes that anyone who reflects on this question will quickly have the correct answer flash in their mind.

Idiomatic_Sent: 这是侯外老未竟的事业，想必这一定是他的在天之灵热切地期待我们去努力实现的。
en_meaning: in the presence of the departed soul
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '这是侯外老未竟的事业，想必这一定是他的在天之灵热切地期待我们去努力实现的。'
English_Sentence_3.5: This is Hou Wailao's unfinished career, and it must be eagerly awaited by his spirit in heaven for us to strive to achieve.
English_Sentence_4o: "This is the unfinished work of Mr. Hou, and it must be his spirit in heaven eagerly expecting us to strive to accomplish it."

Idiomatic_Sent: 然而，渐渐地，对方竟要得寸进尺了，厕所不许我们用，使她的水要另花钱，稍微用多了一点便指桑骂槐地申斥着她的孩子。
en_meaning: take advantage of a small gain to pursue further gain, being greedy and never satisfied
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '然而，渐渐地，对方竟要得寸进尺了，厕所不许我们用，使她的水要另花钱，稍微用多了一点便指桑骂槐地申斥着她的孩子。'
English_Sentence_3.5: However, gradually, the other party unexpectedly began to push for more, not allowing us to use the restroom, causing her to have to spend extra money on water, and slightly scolding her child for using a little too much.
English_Sentence_4o: However, gradually, the other party actually started to take advantage, forbidding us from using the bathroom, making her pay extra for water, and scolding her child indirectly with thinly veiled criticism whenever a bit more was used.

Idiomatic_Sent: 在奥斯特敦克尔克城很多人不愿谈论艾尔玛案件，说到他，他们心有余悸，因为他们心里清楚自己的家庭很可能也有不可外扬的纳粹丑闻。
en_meaning: to still feel fearful and nervous after a scary or dangerous experience
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '在奥斯特敦克尔克城很多人不愿谈论艾尔玛案件，说到他，他们心有余悸，因为他们心里清楚自己的家庭很可能也有不可外扬的纳粹丑闻。'
English_Sentence_3.5: In Dunkirk, many people are unwilling to discuss the Elma case, as they are haunted by the fear that their own families may also have Nazi scandals that cannot be revealed.
English_Sentence_4o: In the town of Oostdunkerque, many people are reluctant to talk about the Elma case; when they mention it, they do so with lingering fear, because they know that their own families might also have unspeakable Nazi scandals.

Idiomatic_Sent: 别埋怨生不逢时，珍惜自己正适逢其会吧。
en_meaning: occurring at the opportune moment; happening to coincide with a suitable opportunity
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '别埋怨生不逢时，珍惜自己正适逢其会吧。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Don't blame your bad timing, cherish the fact that you are in the right place at the right time.
English_Sentence_4o: "Don't complain about being born at the wrong time; cherish the fact that you are meeting the perfect opportunity."

Idiomatic_Sent: 妻：想当年我的身材和体形正面山清水秀，侧面悬崖峭壁，背面柳暗花明，是吧？夫：是呀，可惜水土保持的太差了。
en_meaning: steep cliff or precipice
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '妻：想当年我的身材和体形正面山清水秀，侧面悬崖峭壁，背面柳暗花明，是吧？夫：是呀，可惜水土保持的太差了。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Wife: Back in the day, my figure was like a beautiful mountain from the front, a steep cliff from the side, and a hidden beauty from the back, right? Husband: Yes, but unfortunately the soil and water conservation was poor.
English_Sentence_4o: "Wife: Back in the day, my figure was like a beautiful landscape from the front, a sheer cliff from the side, and a delightful surprise from the back, right? Husband: Yes, but unfortunately, the soil erosion has been quite severe."

Idiomatic_Sent: 有谁敢说自己真的知道那是什么滋味？那种绝望的即将降临又悄悄抱着一丝希望的滋味？那种恐怖的，狼狈的，令人丑态百出的滋味？
en_meaning: making a fool of oneself in various ways
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '有谁敢说自己真的知道那是什么滋味？那种绝望的即将降临又悄悄抱着一丝希望的滋味？那种恐怖的，狼狈的，令人丑态百出的滋味？'
English_Sentence_3.5: Who dares to say they truly know what that taste is like? The taste of impending despair quietly holding onto a thread of hope? The taste of terror, embarrassment, and utter humiliation?
English_Sentence_4o: Who dares to say they truly know what that feeling is? That feeling of impending despair mixed with a faint trace of hope? That terrifying, humiliating, and disgraceful feeling?

Idiomatic_Sent: 但在政策执行上不能打折扣，更不能各行其是，要确保政令畅通，维护中央权威。
en_meaning: each doing their own thing; each following their own course of action
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '但在政策执行上不能打折扣，更不能各行其是，要确保政令畅通，维护中央权威。'
English_Sentence_3.5: However, there can be no discount in policy implementation, and each must not act arbitrarily, to ensure smooth implementation of policies and uphold central authority.
English_Sentence_4o: However, in implementing policies, there must be no discounting, and even less should there be any acting in one's own way; it is necessary to ensure smooth execution of orders and to uphold the authority of the central government.

Idiomatic_Sent: 文章是写给别人看的，讲究文从字顺，如果佶屈聱牙，没人看得懂，便失了作文的意义。
en_meaning: to follow a strict order and be meticulous in writing
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '文章是写给别人看的，讲究文从字顺，如果佶屈聱牙，没人看得懂，便失了作文的意义。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Writing is meant to be read by others, and it should be coherent and well-organized; if it is too convoluted, no one will understand it, and the meaning of the composition will be lost.
English_Sentence_4o: "Articles are written for others to read, and they should be smooth and coherent; if they are obscure and difficult to understand, no one will be able to read them, and the purpose of writing is lost."

Idiomatic_Sent: 对国家民族的大业，我一定沥胆披肝，就是舍弃生命也在所不惜。
en_meaning: willing to do anything regardless of the cost or sacrifice
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '对国家民族的大业，我一定沥胆披肝，就是舍弃生命也在所不惜。'
English_Sentence_3.5: For the great cause of the nation and the people, I will definitely give my all, even if it means sacrificing my life.
English_Sentence_4o: For the great cause of our nation and people, I will pour out my heart and soul, and I am willing to sacrifice my life if necessary.

Idiomatic_Sent: 然而，汉、唐、新三国总是念念不忘夏、商、周侵占本国土地的事情，元气恢复之后，各国不约而同地秣马厉兵，准备收复失地。
en_meaning: simultaneously and without prior arrangement
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '然而，汉、唐、新三国总是念念不忘夏、商、周侵占本国土地的事情，元气恢复之后，各国不约而同地秣马厉兵，准备收复失地。'
English_Sentence_3.5: However, the three kingdoms of Han, Tang, and Xin always remember the invasion of their lands by Xia, Shang, and Zhou. After regaining their strength, all countries simultaneously sharpen their weapons and prepare to recapture the lost territories.
English_Sentence_4o: "However, the Han, Tang, and New Three Kingdoms have always been preoccupied with the land occupation by the Xia, Shang, and Zhou dynasties; once their strength recovered, each nation, without prior agreement, prepared for war to reclaim their lost territories."

Idiomatic_Sent: 大敌当前，你一个人盲目行动，岂不等于飞蛾投火。
en_meaning: having a formidable enemy at present, facing a major threat
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '大敌当前，你一个人盲目行动，岂不等于飞蛾投火。'
English_Sentence_3.5: In the face of a major enemy, acting blindly on your own is like a moth flying into a flame.
English_Sentence_4o: "When faced with a formidable enemy, acting blindly on your own is akin to a moth flying into a flame."

Idiomatic_Sent: 在我想起我们都有的一种唯我论趋向时，有一个故事经常让我忍俊不禁。
en_meaning: unable to hold back laughter
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '在我想起我们都有的一种唯我论趋向时，有一个故事经常让我忍俊不禁。'
English_Sentence_3.5: When I think of the solipsistic tendencies we all have, there is one story that always makes me chuckle.
English_Sentence_4o: When I think about the solipsistic tendency we all share, a particular story often brings a smile to my face.

Idiomatic_Sent: 朋友是什么？他是在你感到天寒地冻之时想起心中有一丝丝暖意的人。
en_meaning: extremely cold weather
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '朋友是什么？他是在你感到天寒地冻之时想起心中有一丝丝暖意的人。'
English_Sentence_3.5: What is a friend? He is the person you think of when you feel cold and lonely, bringing a hint of warmth to your heart.
English_Sentence_4o: What is a friend? A friend is someone who comes to mind as a warm presence when you feel the cold and chill in your heart.

Idiomatic_Sent: 真是暴力冲突的一天啊，什叶派真主党的拥护者与逊尼派在贝鲁特的大街上大打出手。
en_meaning: to have a big fight
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '真是暴力冲突的一天啊，什叶派真主党的拥护者与逊尼派在贝鲁特的大街上大打出手。'
English_Sentence_3.5: It was a day of violent clashes, with supporters of the Shiite Hezbollah and Sunni factions engaging in a fight on the streets of Beirut.
English_Sentence_4o: "It was truly a day of violent clashes; supporters of the Shia Hezbollah and the Sunnis fought fiercely on the streets of Beirut."

Idiomatic_Sent: 软弱者永远进不了爱情的王国，爱情的王国是无情和吝啬的，女人们只肯委身于那些敢作敢为的男子汉，因为这样的男子汉能使他们得到她们所渴望的安全感，使她们能正视生活。 #马尔克斯#
en_meaning: to dare to do and take action without fear or hesitation
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '软弱者永远进不了爱情的王国，爱情的王国是无情和吝啬的，女人们只肯委身于那些敢作敢为的男子汉，因为这样的男子汉能使他们得到她们所渴望的安全感，使她们能正视生活。 #马尔克斯#'
English_Sentence_3.5: The weak will never enter the kingdom of love, for the kingdom of love is ruthless and stingy; women only willing to surrender themselves to those brave men, because such men can give them the sense of security they crave, and enable them to face life squarely. #Marquez#
English_Sentence_4o: The weak will never enter the kingdom of love; the kingdom of love is ruthless and stingy. Women will only commit to men who dare to act because such men can give them the sense of security they crave, allowing them to face life head-on. #Márquez#

Idiomatic_Sent: 从地裂缝一天天扩大的测报来看，叶落知秋，这块地方很快就要有一次较大规模的滑坡了。
en_meaning: Being able to deduce a situation by observing subtle signs.
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '从地裂缝一天天扩大的测报来看，叶落知秋，这块地方很快就要有一次较大规模的滑坡了。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Based on the daily expanding crack in the ground, it is clear that a large-scale landslide is imminent in this area.
English_Sentence_4o: "From the daily monitoring of the widening ground fissures, it's clear that a major landslide is imminent in this area."

Idiomatic_Sent: 猪吃完食乖乖地走到圈里，懒洋洋地躺下了，还不时地哼哼两声，好一副心满意足的样子。这匹马，全身皮毛黑发红，红中透亮，油光水滑，像刚从油缸里跳出来似的。
en_meaning: content and satisfied; feeling fully satisfied or content with what one has achieved or obtained
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '猪吃完食乖乖地走到圈里，懒洋洋地躺下了，还不时地哼哼两声，好一副心满意足的样子。这匹马，全身皮毛黑发红，红中透亮，油光水滑，像刚从油缸里跳出来似的。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The pig finished eating and walked obediently back to the pen, lazily lying down and occasionally grunting, looking completely satisfied. The horse, with its black and shiny coat that gleamed red, looked as if it had just jumped out of an oil barrel.
English_Sentence_4o: After finishing its food, the pig obediently walked back to the pen, lazily lay down, and occasionally grunted, looking very content. The horse, with its black fur tinged with red, gleaming brightly, appeared as though it had just jumped out of an oil vat.

Idiomatic_Sent: 这狗官把这里搞得有死无二，乌烟瘴气，老百姓恨不得将他食肉寝皮。
en_meaning: a place filled with smoke and toxic substances, referring to a chaotic and unhealthy environment
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '这狗官把这里搞得有死无二，乌烟瘴气，老百姓恨不得将他食肉寝皮。'
English_Sentence_3.5: This corrupt official has made this place unbearable, full of chaos and resentment from the common people who wish to see him dead.
English_Sentence_4o: "This corrupt official has made this place a living hell, filled with chaos, and the common people wish they could tear him apart."

Idiomatic_Sent: 一马当先送祝福，万马奔腾小康路。快马加鞭事业创，马不停蹄奔前途。青梅竹马爱情路，天马行空风浪突。人强马壮吉祥安，马年幸福家和睦。祝健康快乐！
en_meaning: non-stop or continuously, without any pause or rest
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '一马当先送祝福，万马奔腾小康路。快马加鞭事业创，马不停蹄奔前途。青梅竹马爱情路，天马行空风浪突。人强马壮吉祥安，马年幸福家和睦。祝健康快乐！'
English_Sentence_3.5: Lead the way with blessings, let thousands of horses gallop towards prosperity. Speed up the career with swift horses, tirelessly heading towards the future. Childhood sweethearts on the path of love, soaring through wind and waves like a celestial horse. With strong people and strong horses, may there be good fortune and peace in the Year of the Horse. Wishing you health and happiness!
English_Sentence_4o: "Leading the way to send blessings, galloping towards a moderately prosperous path. Advancing swiftly in career, forging ahead without a break. Childhood sweethearts on the road of love, free-spirited through waves and turbulence. Strong people and robust horses bring auspicious peace, harmonious family happiness in the Year of the Horse. Wishing you health and joy!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 大雨劈头盖脸的浇下来，顺着脖子灌进去。
en_meaning: a fierce attack in speech or action, without any consideration for the other party
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '大雨劈头盖脸的浇下来，顺着脖子灌进去。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The heavy rain poured down on my head and face, and ran down my neck.
English_Sentence_4o: "The heavy rain poured down, drenching from head to toe and seeping down the neck."

Idiomatic_Sent: 福尔摩斯在办案中十分细心，能够明察秋毫，不放过一点蛛丝马迹。
en_meaning: being extremely discerning and having keen eyesight
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '福尔摩斯在办案中十分细心，能够明察秋毫，不放过一点蛛丝马迹。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Holmes is very meticulous in handling cases, able to see through the minutest details and not miss any clues.
English_Sentence_4o: "Holmes is very meticulous in his investigations, able to see the smallest details and not miss a single clue."

Idiomatic_Sent: 可惜他劣性未改、再入歧路，偏偏再次撞上了张立山，看来真是天理昭彰、因果不爽，也再次验证了天网恢恢、疏而不漏的公理。
en_meaning: thorough and meticulous; leaving no gaps or omissions
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '可惜他劣性未改、再入歧路，偏偏再次撞上了张立山，看来真是天理昭彰、因果不爽，也再次验证了天网恢恢、疏而不漏的公理。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Unfortunately, his bad habits have not changed, and he has once again gone astray, coincidentally running into Zhang Lishan. It seems that justice is clear, karma is undeniable, and it once again confirms the principle that the net of heaven is wide and meshes but nothing slips through.
English_Sentence_4o: "Unfortunately, his bad nature remained unchanged, and he strayed onto the wrong path again, only to run into Zhang Lishan once more. It seems that justice truly prevails and cause meets effect, once again proving the principle that the net of heaven is vast and wide, yet nothing escapes it."

Idiomatic_Sent: 公安人员根据已有的线索，按图索骥，很快找到了那批被盗物资。
en_meaning: following a map and seeking a fine horse
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '公安人员根据已有的线索，按图索骥，很快找到了那批被盗物资。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The public security personnel quickly found the stolen goods based on existing clues and following the map.
English_Sentence_4o: Based on existing clues and following the trail, the police quickly found the stolen goods.

Idiomatic_Sent: 而且，打着"为了国家经济"之类冠冕堂皇的幌子，更容易掩人耳目，增加"救市"行为的"合法性"与"合理性"。
en_meaning: To deceive or hide the truth from others
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '而且，打着"为了国家经济"之类冠冕堂皇的幌子，更容易掩人耳目，增加"救市"行为的"合法性"与"合理性"。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Moreover, under the guise of "for the sake of the national economy," it is easier to deceive and increase the "legitimacy" and "reasonableness" of the "market rescue" actions.
English_Sentence_4o: Moreover, by using high-sounding excuses like "for the sake of the national economy," it becomes easier to deceive people and increase the "legitimacy" and "rationality" of the "market rescue" actions.

Idiomatic_Sent: 一个农妇，在一个学校内，不顾各级组织的谆谆劝导，坚守自己的老宅56年，我自岿然不动。
en_meaning: remaining unmoved and unyielding
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '一个农妇，在一个学校内，不顾各级组织的谆谆劝导，坚守自己的老宅56年，我自岿然不动。'
English_Sentence_3.5: A peasant woman, in a school, despite the earnest persuasion of various levels of organizations, has steadfastly held onto her old house for 56 years, and I stand firm.
English_Sentence_4o: A peasant woman, in a school, disregarded the earnest advice of various organizations and steadfastly held on to her old home for 56 years, declaring, "I remain unmoved."

Idiomatic_Sent: 每年夏天都会传出登革热疫情，为防患未然，请民眾多注意居家环境卫生。
en_meaning: prevent potential dangers in advance; take precautions before a problem occurs
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '每年夏天都会传出登革热疫情，为防患未然，请民眾多注意居家环境卫生。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Every summer there will be outbreaks of dengue fever, to prevent it in advance, please pay attention to home environmental hygiene.
English_Sentence_4o: Every summer, there are reports of dengue fever outbreaks. To prevent this, the public is advised to pay more attention to household hygiene.

Idiomatic_Sent: 便宜行事耳听八方眼观六路，耳听八方见机行事机变如神临机处置灵机一动明察秋毫计上心来巧发奇中情急智生随机应变手急眼快通权达变。
en_meaning: have a wide influence and be able to adapt to changing circumstances
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '便宜行事耳听八方眼观六路，耳听八方见机行事机变如神临机处置灵机一动明察秋毫计上心来巧发奇中情急智生随机应变手急眼快通权达变。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Act cheaply, listen to all directions with your ears, observe all roads with your eyes, listen to all directions and act accordingly, be as quick as a god in responding to changes, handle situations with quick wit, observe every detail, plan carefully, be quick and clever in unexpected situations, adapt quickly, and be flexible in handling various situations.
English_Sentence_4o: Act according to circumstances, listen in all directions, observe all routes, seize opportunities and act wisely, adapt like a deity, handle situations promptly, have sudden insights, discern the minutest details, devise clever strategies, hit the mark with ingenuity, respond intelligently in emergencies, adapt flexibly, and act swiftly with keen perception.

Idiomatic_Sent: 大人们说的话，信以为真了很久，直到长大还将信将疑呢。

Idiomatic_Sent: 关上家门意味着让无法无天的世界自生自灭，对夜间到凌晨的一切听之任之。 #胡利奥·科塔萨尔#
en_meaning: lawless and unruly, without any restraints or control
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '关上家门意味着让无法无天的世界自生自灭，对夜间到凌晨的一切听之任之。 #胡利奥·科塔萨尔#'

Idiomatic_Sent: 面对烦恼，人之常情。但是，仅仅只是面对烦恼而不去解决，是不足的，这样的人生也太被动了吧！我们应该反客为主，做到不怕烦恼，挑战烦恼。
en_meaning: common human behavior or reaction
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '面对烦恼，人之常情。但是，仅仅只是面对烦恼而不去解决，是不足的，这样的人生也太被动了吧！我们应该反客为主，做到不怕烦恼，挑战烦恼。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Facing troubles is a common human experience. However, simply facing troubles without solving them is insufficient. Such a passive way of life! We should take the initiative, not fear troubles, and challenge them.
English_Sentence_4o: "Facing troubles is human nature. However, merely facing troubles without resolving them is insufficient, and such a life is too passive! We should take the initiative and not fear troubles, but rather challenge them."

Idiomatic_Sent: 做人如果优柔寡断，踟蹰不前，往往会坐失良机。
en_meaning: miss a great opportunity

English_Sentence_3.5: If a person is indecisive and hesitant, they often miss out on good opportunities.
English_Sentence_4o: "If a person is indecisive and hesitant, they often miss out on good opportunities."

Idiomatic_Sent: 但正像我们可敬的绅士们尽管“得天独厚”，优游自在，却也常常要无病呻吟一样，豪猪也喜欢这调门。
en_meaning: being extremely fortunate or having exceptional advantages

English_Sentence_3.5: But just like our respected gentlemen, despite their "privileged situation" and leisurely lifestyle, they often like to complain as if they were sick, and the porcupines also enjoy this tone.
English_Sentence_4o: 'But just as our respectable gentlemen, despite being privileged and leisurely, often complain without reason, so too does the porcupine enjoy this tune.'

Idiomatic_Sent: 但另一方面，但没有什么灵丹妙药可以绕过DPI。通常用户只能通过“寻找系统漏洞”的方式来暂时的逃避它。

Idiomatic_Sent: 对承德市的交通、食宿、土特产等方面进行了介绍，可以让游客能够花费较少的费用而游玩的更尽兴，不会乘兴而来败兴而归。

Idiomatic_Sent: 我没有回答，但心里却想：燕雀焉知鸿鹄之志！
en_meaning: ambitious aspirations or goals
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '我没有回答，但心里却想：燕雀焉知鸿鹄之志！'

English_Sentence_4o: I did not respond, but I thought to myself: "How can a sparrow understand the ambition of a swan?"

Idiomatic_Sent: 我们3个女生打算亲自下厨…请大家吃一顿别出心裁的家常便饭。

English_Sentence_4o: The three of us girls are planning to cook ourselves and treat everyone to a uniquely homemade meal.

Idiomatic_Sent: 青烟仙子说的没错，我等为国进言，何罪之有?

English_Sentence_3.5: The Fairy of Qingyan Smoke is right, what crime is there in offering advice for the country?
English_Sentence_4o: Fairy Qingyan was right; we spoke up for the country, what crime is there in that?

Idiomatic_Sent: 一直很想拿郭潇当典型，杀鸡吓猴的典型，因为她并不是一个传统意义上的好学生，虽然她的成绩总是名列前茅。
en_meaning: to be among the top ranked or listed in the forefront

English_Sentence_3.5: I have always wanted to use Guo Xiao as a typical example of "killing the chicken to scare the monkey", because she is not a good student in the traditional sense, even though she always ranks at the top of the class.
English_Sentence_4o: "I have always wanted to use Guo Xiao as an example, a typical case of 'killing the chicken to scare the monkey,' because she is not a good student in the traditional sense, even though her grades are always among the top."

Idiomatic_Sent: 我已经和公司打成一片。它以我为生，我也和它生活在一起，日夜形影不离……它是我的情人。我害怕失去它也担心失败，并尽量避免失误。这是一种悲惨的生活。
en_meaning: getting along harmoniously, forming a close bond

English_Sentence_3.5: I have already become one with the company. It relies on me for its existence, and I live with it day and night, inseparable... It is my lover. I am afraid of losing it and worried about failure, trying my best to avoid mistakes. This is a miserable life.
English_Sentence_4o: I have already integrated myself with the company. It relies on me for survival, and I live with it, inseparable day and night... It is my lover. I am afraid of losing it and worried about failure, and I try to avoid mistakes. This is a miserable life.

Idiomatic_Sent: 洛阳的春天是属于牡丹的，她们在这温暖的四月竞相开放，让爱她的人们赏心悦目、心旷神怡。倘若你站在牡丹丛中，你一定会陶醉于她那独特的香味，因为任何花香都不能与牡丹花香相媲美。
en_meaning: pleasing to the eye; beautiful; visually appealing
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '洛阳的春天是属于牡丹的，她们在这温暖的四月竞相开放，让爱她的人们赏心悦目、心旷神怡。倘若你站在牡丹丛中，你一定会陶醉于她那独特的香味，因为任何花香都不能与牡丹花香相媲美。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The spring in Luoyang belongs to peonies, they bloom in abundance in this warm April, delighting those who love them and refreshing their spirits. If you stand among the peony bushes, you will surely be intoxicated by their unique fragrance, as no other floral scent can compare to that of peonies.
English_Sentence_4o: "Spring in Luoyang belongs to the peonies; they bloom in this warm April, delighting and refreshing those who love them. If you stand among the peony bushes, you will surely be enchanted by their unique fragrance, as no other flower's scent can compare to that of the peony."

Idiomatic_Sent: 重要的是根据自己的身体状况量力而行。
en_meaning: to act within one's limits or capabilities

English_Sentence_4o: The important thing is to act according to your own physical condition.

Idiomatic_Sent: 忠言逆耳利于行，良药苦口利于玻。
en_meaning: unpleasant or unwelcome advice or criticism that is difficult to accept, but ultimately necessary
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '忠言逆耳利于行，良药苦口利于玻。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Good advice may be hard to swallow, but it benefits the action; good medicine may be bitter to the mouth, but it benefits the body.
English_Sentence_4o: "Good advice is harsh to the ear but beneficial to one's conduct, just as good medicine is bitter to the mouth but good for the illness."

Idiomatic_Sent: 世界上的事物都是相反相成的，所以好事在一定条件下也可以变成坏事。
en_meaning: opposites complement each other
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '世界上的事物都是相反相成的，所以好事在一定条件下也可以变成坏事。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Things in the world are all interdependent, so good things can also turn into bad things under certain conditions.
English_Sentence_4o: Things in the world are both opposites and complements, so under certain conditions, good things can also turn into bad things.

Idiomatic_Sent: 改革运动在南方如火如荼地开展着。

translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '改革运动在南方如火如荼地开展着。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The reform movement is unfolding rapidly in the south.
English_Sentence_4o: "The reform movement is unfolding in full swing in the South."

Idiomatic_Sent: 火锅在我们呼天呛地面红耳赤地蚕食鲸吞后，很快就只剩沧海一粟，和少数的漏网之鱼。
en_meaning: a drop in the ocean; something insignificant in comparison to a vast amount

English_Sentence_3.5: After the hotpot feast, all that was left was a drop in the ocean and a few fish that had slipped through the net.
English_Sentence_4o: "After we devoured the hotpot with much noise and excitement, it quickly became just a drop in the ocean, with only a few morsels left."

Idiomatic_Sent: 灰白色的炊烟和灰色的暮霭交融在一起，像是给墙头屋脊树顶都罩上了一层薄薄的玻璃纸，使它们变得若隐若现，飘飘荡荡，很有几分奇妙的气氛。
en_meaning: to appear and disappear in a vague and elusive manner
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '灰白色的炊烟和灰色的暮霭交融在一起，像是给墙头屋脊树顶都罩上了一层薄薄的玻璃纸，使它们变得若隐若现，飘飘荡荡，很有几分奇妙的气氛。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The pale gray cooking smoke and the gray dusk haze blend together, as if a thin layer of glass paper has covered the walls, rooftops, and treetops, making them appear faint and ethereal, creating a somewhat magical atmosphere.

Idiomatic_Sent: 对社会地位，势利者必须不停地巴结社会名流，新潮势利者永远不可能停止追求时尚，疾病或文化势利者各自朝思暮想的必定是瑞士医生或人们被称作是最好的一切。
en_meaning: longing and thinking day and night; constantly yearning for someone or something
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '对社会地位，势利者必须不停地巴结社会名流，新潮势利者永远不可能停止追求时尚，疾病或文化势利者各自朝思暮想的必定是瑞士医生或人们被称作是最好的一切。'
English_Sentence_3.5: In terms of social status, social climbers must constantly flatter social elites, trendy social climbers will never stop pursuing fashion, and health or cultural climbers will always dream of Swiss doctors or people considered the best of everything.
English_Sentence_4o: For social status, snobs must constantly curry favor with social celebrities, trendy snobs can never stop pursuing fashion, and those who are snobbish about illness or culture invariably yearn for Swiss doctors or what people call the best of everything.

Idiomatic_Sent: 而幸运的狄克不可能是个聪明人;他一定没那么完美无缺，甚至于微受损毁。要是生活不能使他这样，生病、失恋或者自卑感也不会对他有什么作用，不过对破损的地方重新建设得比原来的结构好些，倒也是一件好事。
en_meaning: perfect and flawless
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '而幸运的狄克不可能是个聪明人;他一定没那么完美无缺，甚至于微受损毁。要是生活不能使他这样，生病、失恋或者自卑感也不会对他有什么作用，不过对破损的地方重新建设得比原来的结构好些，倒也是一件好事。'
English_Sentence_3.5: But luckily Dick cannot be a smart person; he must not be so perfect, even slightly damaged. If life cannot make him like this, sickness, heartbreak, or self-doubt will not affect him either, but rebuilding the damaged parts better than the original structure is also a good thing.
English_Sentence_4o: But the fortunate Dick could not have been a smart man; he must not have been so perfect, or even slightly flawed. If life couldn't do this to him, neither illness, heartbreak, nor inferiority would affect him much, but rebuilding the damaged parts better than the original structure is indeed a good thing.

Idiomatic_Sent: 他说到他们的流离失所，受的羞辱和家园被占领时非常动情。

English_Sentence_4o: He was very emotional when he spoke about their displacement, the humiliation they suffered, and the occupation of their homeland.

Idiomatic_Sent: 尽管这帮歹徒狡兔三窟，但最终还是难逃法网。

Idiomatic_Sent: 你看，它最大的长四米，最小的也有一米，一双炯炯有神的大眼睛虎视眈眈，如此威风凛凛，颇有王者风范，就连鲨鱼也一定视为吴下阿蒙，见一眼中华鲟也得甘拜下风了。
en_meaning: imposing and awe-inspiring
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '你看，它最大的长四米，最小的也有一米，一双炯炯有神的大眼睛虎视眈眈，如此威风凛凛，颇有王者风范，就连鲨鱼也一定视为吴下阿蒙，见一眼中华鲟也得甘拜下风了。'
English_Sentence_3.5: "Look, its largest one is four meters long, and the smallest one is one meter long. Its pair of bright and keen eyes are fierce and intimidating, exuding a kingly demeanor. Even sharks would surely see it as an inferior opponent, and catching a glimpse of a Chinese sturgeon would also pale in comparison."
English_Sentence_4o: "Look, the largest one is four meters long, and the smallest is still one meter, with a pair of bright, piercing eyes staring intently; so majestic and regal, even sharks would consider it inferior, and upon seeing the Chinese sturgeon, they would surely submit in awe."

Idiomatic_Sent: 这家伙畏罪潜逃，今天自己送上门来，岂不是飞蛾投火。
en_meaning: to be self-destructive; to willingly go towards danger or harm
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '这家伙畏罪潜逃，今天自己送上门来，岂不是飞蛾投火。'
English_Sentence_3.5: This guy, who fled in fear of punishment, is now coming to us voluntarily today, isn't he like a moth flying into the fire.
English_Sentence_4o: "This guy fled to avoid punishment, but today he came right to us; isn't that like a moth flying into the flame?"

Idiomatic_Sent: 大大咧咧的陪着刘山，山南海北的穷侃吧啦，不过好在语言风趣，倒也引起众人的一阵阵的讪笑。
en_meaning: far and wide; all over the place

Idiomatic_Sent: 我没有夸大其词！昨天派对里大多数的女孩都疯狂地著迷于那个男模特儿。

English_Sentence_3.5: I am not exaggerating! Most of the girls at the party were crazily obsessed with that male model yesterday.
English_Sentence_4o: I am not exaggerating! Most of the girls at the party yesterday were crazy about that male model.

Idiomatic_Sent: 今非昔比，你老是想用老方法解决新问题，和刻舟求剑有何不同？
en_meaning: Things have changed and are no longer the same as before
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '今非昔比，你老是想用老方法解决新问题，和刻舟求剑有何不同？'
English_Sentence_3.5: Things are different now, always trying to solve new problems with old methods, how is that any different from looking for a sword by carving a boat?
English_Sentence_4o: "Times have changed; you always want to use old methods to solve new problems. How is that different from carving a mark on a boat to find a sword?"

Idiomatic_Sent: 中华民族是礼仪之邦，自古崇尚投桃报李，礼尚往来。
en_meaning: a country known for its courtesy and etiquette; a nation that upholds proper manners and protocols
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '中华民族是礼仪之邦，自古崇尚投桃报李，礼尚往来。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The Chinese nation is a country of etiquette, and has always advocated the principle of repaying kindness with kindness and maintaining mutual respect.
English_Sentence_4o: The Chinese nation is a land of etiquette, valuing the principle of repaying kindness and the reciprocity of courtesy since ancient times.

Idiomatic_Sent: 为人主管者必须公正无私，奖罚分明，才能树立良好的纪律，使众人信服。
en_meaning: fair and impartial

English_Sentence_3.5: Those in charge must be fair and impartial, clear in rewards and punishments, in order to establish good discipline and gain the trust of others.
English_Sentence_4o: A person in a managerial position must be impartial and selfless, with clear rewards and punishments, in order to establish good discipline and gain the trust of others.

Idiomatic_Sent: 酗酒者善于在自身问题的严重性上自欺欺人，这是人所共知的。
en_meaning: widely known by everyone

English_Sentence_3.5: Alcoholics are adept at deceiving themselves about the seriousness of their own problems, a fact well-known to all.
English_Sentence_4o: "It is well known that heavy drinkers are adept at deceiving themselves about the seriousness of their own problems."

Idiomatic_Sent: 那个人声名狼藉，妳还想跟他交朋友？

English_Sentence_4o: "That person has a notorious reputation, and you still want to be friends with him?"

Idiomatic_Sent: 大名鼎鼎的曹操曹孟德千里迢迢、风尘仆仆地来到京城，口口声声说是来保护皇帝的，引得大家议论纷纷。
en_meaning: well-known and famous
