The Party entrusted us with 360,000 people, and we failed to lead them in overcoming the famine and living a peaceful and prosperous life. We should feel ashamed and heartbroken."

Idiomatic_Sent: 大卫简直目不转睛也看着她，詹尼见了心里乐滋滋的。
en_meaning: To focus one's attention intently and unwaveringly
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '大卫简直目不转睛也看着她，詹尼见了心里乐滋滋的。'
English_Sentence_3.5: David simply couldn't take his eyes off her, and Jenny was thrilled to see that.
English_Sentence_4o: "David was staring at her without blinking, and Jenny felt overjoyed when she saw it."

Idiomatic_Sent: 年轻父亲们的众生相：半夜三更换尿布，孩子饿了忙下厨，孩子哭闹不知所措满脸愁苦，给孩子当马爬满屋，孩子一笑再累再苦都幸福；父亲节到祝你们幸福！
en_meaning: to be at a loss, unsure of what to do or how to handle a situation
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '年轻父亲们的众生相：半夜三更换尿布，孩子饿了忙下厨，孩子哭闹不知所措满脸愁苦，给孩子当马爬满屋，孩子一笑再累再苦都幸福；父亲节到祝你们幸福！'
English_Sentence_3.5: The various aspects of young fathers: changing diapers in the middle of the night, rushing to cook when the child is hungry, feeling helpless and worried when the child cries, crawling around the house pretending to be a horse for the child, and feeling happy despite being tired and in pain; Happy Father's Day to you all!
English_Sentence_4o: "The many faces of young fathers: changing diapers in the middle of the night, rushing to the kitchen when the baby is hungry, feeling helpless and worried when the baby cries, crawling around the house like a horse for the baby, and feeling happy no matter how tired or hard it is when the baby smiles; wishing you all happiness on Father's Day!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 秋天的天气是凉爽的，它不再像夏天一样闷热，闷热的天气使人透不过气来，人们不开空调好像受不了似的。现在碧空如洗的蓝天上，云彩做着各种各样的造型，真有一种秋高气爽、心胸开阔的感觉。
en_meaning: refreshing autumn weather
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '秋天的天气是凉爽的，它不再像夏天一样闷热，闷热的天气使人透不过气来，人们不开空调好像受不了似的。现在碧空如洗的蓝天上，云彩做着各种各样的造型，真有一种秋高气爽、心胸开阔的感觉。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The weather in autumn is cool, no longer as hot and stuffy as in summer. The stifling heat makes it hard to breathe, and people seem unable to bear it without air conditioning. Now, the sky is clear and the blue sky is washed clean, with clouds forming various shapes, giving a feeling of refreshing autumn and a broad mind.
English_Sentence_4o: The autumn weather is cool; it is no longer as stuffy as summer, when the oppressive heat made it hard to breathe and people couldn't bear it without air conditioning. Now, in the clear blue skies, clouds take on various shapes, creating a feeling of refreshing autumn air and an open heart.

Idiomatic_Sent: 他善于辞令，口若悬河，真是当外交官的好人才。
en_meaning: to speak fluently and eloquently
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '他善于辞令，口若悬河，真是当外交官的好人才。'
English_Sentence_3.5: He is good at rhetoric, eloquent, truly a talented diplomat.
English_Sentence_4o: "He is eloquent and speaks fluently, truly a great talent for a diplomat."

Idiomatic_Sent: 这对银发夫妻数十年相处之道就在举案齐眉，相敬如宾。
en_meaning: having a harmonious and equal relationship between husband and wife
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '这对银发夫妻数十年相处之道就在举案齐眉，相敬如宾。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The key to the decades-long relationship of this silver-haired couple lies in treating each other with equal respect and as honored guests.
English_Sentence_4o: "The secret to this elderly couple's decades-long harmonious relationship lies in their mutual respect and consideration for each other, treating one another with the utmost courtesy."

Idiomatic_Sent: 望着万仞崖顶上那笔直的松树，大家不由得赞叹大自然的神工鬼斧。也作“鬼斧神工”。
en_meaning: masterful craftsmanship, referring to something created with exceptional skill and expertise
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '望着万仞崖顶上那笔直的松树，大家不由得赞叹大自然的神工鬼斧。也作“鬼斧神工”。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Looking at the straight pine tree on the top of the towering cliff, everyone couldn't help but admire the magical work of nature. Also known as "divine craftsmanship".
English_Sentence_4o: Looking at the straight pine tree on the top of the towering cliff, everyone couldn't help but marvel at the uncanny craftsmanship of nature. Also expressed as "uncanny craftsmanship."

Idiomatic_Sent: 这并不是危言耸听，要是我们不珍惜水资源，总有一天会无水可用。
en_meaning: sensationalized or exaggerated words of warning
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '这并不是危言耸听，要是我们不珍惜水资源，总有一天会无水可用。'
English_Sentence_3.5: This is not an alarmist statement; if we do not cherish water resources, there will come a day when there is no water available.
English_Sentence_4o: This is not an alarmist talk; if we do not cherish water resources, there will come a day when we have no water to use.

Idiomatic_Sent: 人，一简单就快乐，但快乐的人寥寥无几；一复杂就痛苦，可痛苦的人却熙熙攘攘。
en_meaning: very few; scarce; rare
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '人，一简单就快乐，但快乐的人寥寥无几；一复杂就痛苦，可痛苦的人却熙熙攘攘。'
English_Sentence_3.5: People find happiness in simplicity, but those who are truly happy are few; complexity brings pain, yet those who suffer are abundant.
English_Sentence_4o: "People, when simple, are happy, but there are very few happy people; when complex, they are in pain, yet there are crowds of people in pain."

Idiomatic_Sent: 尽管设计得金碧辉煌，建造罗马竞技场的主要目的是，在愤世嫉俗的时代中，供人们忘情娱乐，演出戏剧张力十足、不时令人毛骨悚然的娱乐节目。
en_meaning: to feel a chilling sensation down one's spine
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '尽管设计得金碧辉煌，建造罗马竞技场的主要目的是，在愤世嫉俗的时代中，供人们忘情娱乐，演出戏剧张力十足、不时令人毛骨悚然的娱乐节目。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Despite being designed magnificently, the main purpose of building the Roman Colosseum was to provide people with entertainment to forget about the cynicism of the time, showcasing dramatic and thrilling entertainment programs.
English_Sentence_4o: "Despite its splendid design, the main purpose of building the Roman Colosseum was to provide people with unrestrained entertainment in a cynical era, featuring dramatic and occasionally horrifying performances."

Idiomatic_Sent: 夏天的雨是狂风暴雨，他处处充满了严厉；秋天的雨是楚楚动人的雨，她饱含着深情；而冬天的雨是冷酷无情的雨，他蕴藏着冰冷的气息。然而，我最喜欢的是寒冷的冬日过后，那千姿百态，五彩缤纷的春雨。
en_meaning: various postures and states, diverse and colorful
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '夏天的雨是狂风暴雨，他处处充满了严厉；秋天的雨是楚楚动人的雨，她饱含着深情；而冬天的雨是冷酷无情的雨，他蕴藏着冰冷的气息。然而，我最喜欢的是寒冷的冬日过后，那千姿百态，五彩缤纷的春雨。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The summer rain is a fierce storm, filled with severity everywhere; the autumn rain is charming and moving, full of deep affection; while the winter rain is cold and heartless, carrying a chilling atmosphere. However, my favorite is the colorful spring rain that comes after the cold winter days.
English_Sentence_4o: The summer rain is a stormy one, filled with severity; the autumn rain is an enchanting one, full of deep affection; and the winter rain is a merciless one, carrying a chill. However, my favorite is the rain of spring after the cold winter, with its myriad forms and vibrant colors.

Idiomatic_Sent: 清晨早起，按图索骥去往当地知名的鱼市场，所闻所见均让人大呼过瘾。
en_meaning: following a map and seeking a fine horse
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '清晨早起，按图索骥去往当地知名的鱼市场，所闻所见均让人大呼过瘾。'
English_Sentence_3.5: In the early morning, I got up and headed to the local famous fish market following the map, and everything I saw and heard was really exciting.
English_Sentence_4o: "Rising early in the morning, following a map to the renowned local fish market, everything seen and heard was immensely satisfying."

Idiomatic_Sent: 罂粟花开真美丽，香飘万里垂涎滴。制成毒品害人深，妻离子散钱财尽。为了毒品天良丧，杀人越货不惜命。犯罪只为吸毒品，社会败类人唾弃。国际禁毒日，愿你远离毒品，家庭幸福社会安。
en_meaning: the family falls apart, with the husband and children scattered
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '罂粟花开真美丽，香飘万里垂涎滴。制成毒品害人深，妻离子散钱财尽。为了毒品天良丧，杀人越货不惜命。犯罪只为吸毒品，社会败类人唾弃。国际禁毒日，愿你远离毒品，家庭幸福社会安。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The poppy flowers are truly beautiful when in bloom, their fragrance drifting for miles and causing covetous desires. However, when turned into drugs, they harm people deeply, leading to broken families and financial ruin. Losing one's conscience for drugs, some are willing to kill for them. Those who commit crimes only to feed their drug addiction are shunned by society. On International Day Against Drug Abuse, may you stay far away from drugs and enjoy a happy and safe life within your community.
English_Sentence_4o: Poppies bloom beautifully, their fragrance wafts far, enticing. Made into drugs, they harm deeply, causing families to break and finances to deplete. For the sake of drugs, morals are lost, committing murder and theft without regard for life. Crimes are committed just to obtain drugs, and such people are scorned by society. On International Day Against Drug Abuse, may you stay away from drugs, ensuring a happy family and a peaceful society.

Idiomatic_Sent: 他以为他可以将计就计靠近敌方，然后出其不意地攻下阵地，可事实证明他设想的一切都只是纸上谈兵。
en_meaning: to use the opponent's strategy against them
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '他以为他可以将计就计靠近敌方，然后出其不意地攻下阵地，可事实证明他设想的一切都只是纸上谈兵。'
English_Sentence_3.5: He thought he could outsmart the enemy by getting close and then unexpectedly attacking their position, but in reality, all his plans were just empty talk.
English_Sentence_4o: He thought he could use a stratagem to get close to the enemy and then take the position by surprise, but it turned out that all his plans were just empty talk.

Idiomatic_Sent: 奶奶为了让上班的妈妈有更多的时间照顾我的学习和生活，她任劳任怨的把家里的家务活全包了。每天放学回家，我都可以吃到热腾腾、香喷喷的饭菜，奶奶看到我狼吞虎咽的馋样，总是笑得特别开心。我之所以长的这么高、健康，奶奶可是功劳大大的！
en_meaning: willing to do any labor and bear any hardship
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '奶奶为了让上班的妈妈有更多的时间照顾我的学习和生活，她任劳任怨的把家里的家务活全包了。每天放学回家，我都可以吃到热腾腾、香喷喷的饭菜，奶奶看到我狼吞虎咽的馋样，总是笑得特别开心。我之所以长的这么高、健康，奶奶可是功劳大大的！'
English_Sentence_3.5: Grandma took on all the household chores without complaint in order to give my mom, who works, more time to take care of my studies and life. Every day after school, I can eat hot and delicious meals, and Grandma always smiles happily when she sees me eating eagerly. Grandma deserves a lot of credit for my tall and healthy growth!
English_Sentence_4o: Grandma took on all the household chores without complaint so that my working mom could have more time to take care of my studies and daily life. Every day when I come home from school, I can eat hot and delicious meals. Seeing me devour the food, Grandma always smiles happily. The reason I have grown so tall and healthy is largely due to Grandma's efforts!

Idiomatic_Sent: 吴程觉得，不结识他们就难以理解什么是商品经济的社会形态特征，不跟他们称兄道弟而开诚相见就难以领取进入他们那个世界的通行证。
en_meaning: use the form of address 'brother' to someone who is not a real brother, indicating a friendly and close relationship
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '吴程觉得，不结识他们就难以理解什么是商品经济的社会形态特征，不跟他们称兄道弟而开诚相见就难以领取进入他们那个世界的通行证。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Wu Cheng feels that without getting to know them, it is difficult to understand the social and economic characteristics of a commodity economy; without becoming close to them and opening up to them, it is difficult to receive the entry permit into their world.
English_Sentence_4o: Wu Cheng felt that without getting to know them, it would be hard to understand the characteristic features of a commodity economy society; without becoming close like brothers and being open with them, it would be difficult to gain the pass to enter their world.

Idiomatic_Sent: 没钱的时候，他信誓旦旦地说要如何节俭，一旦有了钱，却又故态复萌，极尽奢华。
en_meaning: old problems or bad habits resurging, repeating the same mistakes
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '没钱的时候，他信誓旦旦地说要如何节俭，一旦有了钱，却又故态复萌，极尽奢华。'
English_Sentence_3.5: When he has no money, he solemnly swears to be frugal, but once he has money, he reverts to his old ways and indulges in extravagance.
English_Sentence_4o: "When he had no money, he vowed to be frugal, but once he got money, he reverted to his old ways and indulged in luxury."

Idiomatic_Sent: 龙阳来了之后，所有人都是一哄而散了!“龙宇，若是他们在欺负你，就和我说!”。
en_meaning: disperse or scatter in a sudden and disorderly manner
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '龙阳来了之后，所有人都是一哄而散了!“龙宇，若是他们在欺负你，就和我说!”。'
English_Sentence_3.5: "Longyang arrived, and everyone scattered in all directions! Longyu, if they are bullying you, just tell me!"
English_Sentence_4o: "After Long Yang arrived, everyone scattered! 'Long Yu, if they bully you, just tell me!'"

Idiomatic_Sent: 但是当我们开始约会，并旁敲侧击谈论婚姻前景时，我才突然意识到中国人的家庭关系有多么的紧密，家庭成员之间是多么的相互扶持。
en_meaning: approaching a subject indirectly or subtly, usually in order to avoid confrontation or to achieve a desired outcome
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '但是当我们开始约会，并旁敲侧击谈论婚姻前景时，我才突然意识到中国人的家庭关系有多么的紧密，家庭成员之间是多么的相互扶持。'
English_Sentence_3.5: But when we started dating and subtly discussed the prospects of marriage, I suddenly realized how close Chinese family relationships are, and how supportive family members are of each other.
English_Sentence_4o: However, when we started dating and subtly discussed the prospects of marriage, I suddenly realized how close-knit Chinese family relationships are and how supportive family members are of each other.

Idiomatic_Sent: 杜某言语支吾，含糊其辞，在杜女士的一再追问下，杜某称其已将母亲打死，并将尸体扔入黄河。
en_meaning: to be evasive or ambiguous in speech
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '杜某言语支吾，含糊其辞，在杜女士的一再追问下，杜某称其已将母亲打死，并将尸体扔入黄河。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Du was evasive in his speech, ambiguous in his words. Under Ms. Du's repeated questioning, Du admitted to having killed his mother and thrown her body into the Yellow River.
English_Sentence_4o: "Du mumbled and spoke ambiguously. Under Du Ms.'s repeated questioning, Du claimed that he had beaten his mother to death and thrown the body into the Yellow River."

Idiomatic_Sent: 要细心关注孩子的日常生活行为，防微杜渐，发现有不良的行为即以纠正，只有这样才能提高教学质量。
en_meaning: Take precautions and prevent problems before they become serious
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '要细心关注孩子的日常生活行为，防微杜渐，发现有不良的行为即以纠正，只有这样才能提高教学质量。'
English_Sentence_3.5: To improve the quality of teaching, one must pay close attention to the child's daily behavior, nip problems in the bud, and correct any bad behavior when discovered.
English_Sentence_4o: Pay close attention to children's daily behavior, prevent problems before they arise, and correct any bad behavior as soon as it is noticed; only in this way can the quality of education be improved.

Idiomatic_Sent: 在当今主流被各种门事件牵着走的时候，俺，也不坐以待毙，咱也来个门，啥门？闭门！——闭门思过、闭关修炼！
en_meaning: to wait for death without attempting to change or improve the situation
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '在当今主流被各种门事件牵着走的时候，俺，也不坐以待毙，咱也来个门，啥门？闭门！——闭门思过、闭关修炼！'
English_Sentence_3.5: In today's mainstream, where various scandals are leading the way, I won't just sit back and wait. Let's also have a scandal, what kind? A closed-door scandal! - Reflecting on one's mistakes and practicing in seclusion!
English_Sentence_4o: "In today's world, where mainstream media is driven by various scandals, I won't sit idly by either. I'll create my own 'gate'—what kind of gate? A closed gate!—A gate for self-reflection and self-improvement!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 这道士吹嘘他能呼风唤雨，化水成冰。
en_meaning: to have great power and influence, able to command the wind and summon the rain
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '这道士吹嘘他能呼风唤雨，化水成冰。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The Taoist boasts that he can summon wind and rain, and turn water into ice.
English_Sentence_4o: The Taoist priest boasted that he could summon wind and rain and turn water into ice.

Idiomatic_Sent: 我爱老师，我更爱老师的那双明媚的眼睛。老师的眼睛明亮美丽，和蔼可亲；老师的眼睛炯炯有神，明察秋毫；老师的眼睛，充满智慧，热情，使人奋进。
en_meaning: being extremely discerning and having keen eyesight
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '我爱老师，我更爱老师的那双明媚的眼睛。老师的眼睛明亮美丽，和蔼可亲；老师的眼睛炯炯有神，明察秋毫；老师的眼睛，充满智慧，热情，使人奋进。'
English_Sentence_3.5: I love my teacher, but I love my teacher's bright and beautiful eyes even more. Her eyes are bright and friendly, sharp and perceptive, full of wisdom and passion, motivating and inspiring.
English_Sentence_4o: I love my teacher, but I love my teacher's bright eyes even more. The teacher's eyes are bright and beautiful, kind and friendly; the teacher's eyes are piercing and can see the smallest detail; the teacher's eyes are full of wisdom and passion, inspiring others to strive forward.

Idiomatic_Sent: 他们常常愁眉不展，情绪低落，郁郁寡欢，不苟言笑，遇事退缩，给学习生活带来一种无形的压力。
en_meaning: wearing a worried frown; having a furrowed brow due to worries or difficulties
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '他们常常愁眉不展，情绪低落，郁郁寡欢，不苟言笑，遇事退缩，给学习生活带来一种无形的压力。'
English_Sentence_3.5: They often furrow their brows, feel low in spirits, appear melancholic, rarely smile or laugh, shrink back when faced with difficulties, and bring about an invisible pressure to their study and life.
English_Sentence_4o: "They are often frowning and depressed, melancholy and silent, rarely speaking, retreating in the face of challenges, bringing an invisible pressure to their studies and life."

Idiomatic_Sent: 请八皇子恕罪，紫旋她脑部受创至今未痊愈，说话更不知礼数，还望八皇子高抬贵手，饶过她这回，臣定严加管教。
en_meaning: show mercy, give someone a break
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '请八皇子恕罪，紫旋她脑部受创至今未痊愈，说话更不知礼数，还望八皇子高抬贵手，饶过她这回，臣定严加管教。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Please forgive the Eighth Prince, Zixuan has not fully recovered from her head injury until now, speaking without manners. I hope the Eighth Prince will be lenient this time and I will discipline her strictly.
English_Sentence_4o: "Please forgive her, Your Highness the Eighth Prince. Zixuan suffered a head injury and has not yet recovered, so she speaks without knowing proper manners. I humbly ask for your leniency this time, and I pledge to discipline her strictly."

Idiomatic_Sent: 小明上课丝毫不听，时不时呆若木鸡，连老师也无可奈何。
en_meaning: to be stunned or dumbfounded
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '小明上课丝毫不听，时不时呆若木鸡，连老师也无可奈何。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Xiao Ming pays no attention in class, often sitting there like a wooden chicken, leaving the teacher helpless.
English_Sentence_4o: Xiao Ming doesn't listen in class at all, and is often as dumb as a wooden chicken, leaving even the teacher helpless.

Idiomatic_Sent: 诸葛亮舌战群儒，鲁子敬力排众议。
en_meaning: to go against public opinion and stand firm with one's own beliefs or decisions
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '诸葛亮舌战群儒，鲁子敬力排众议。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Zhuge Liang engaged in a war of words with a group of scholars, while Lu Zijin stood firm against public opinion.
English_Sentence_4o: "Zhuge Liang debates a group of scholars, while Lu Zijing adamantly opposes the majority opinion."

Idiomatic_Sent: 选举会上，他哗众取宠，自吹自擂，无非是为了捞取政治资本。
en_meaning: boasting about one's own achievements; bragging about oneself
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '选举会上，他哗众取宠，自吹自擂，无非是为了捞取政治资本。'
English_Sentence_3.5: At the election meeting, he catered to the crowd, boasted about himself, all just to gain political capital.
English_Sentence_4o: At the election meeting, he resorted to grandstanding and boasting, merely to gain political capital.

Idiomatic_Sent: 再看那田径赛场上的运动员，也个个摩拳擦掌，毫不示弱。跳高跳远的运动员为了得到更好的成绩，拼尽全力，即使失败也毫不放弃。他们面对目标跨出坚定的步伐，跳了一次又一次。
en_meaning: eager and ready, as if rubbing one's hands together in anticipation
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '再看那田径赛场上的运动员，也个个摩拳擦掌，毫不示弱。跳高跳远的运动员为了得到更好的成绩，拼尽全力，即使失败也毫不放弃。他们面对目标跨出坚定的步伐，跳了一次又一次。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Looking at the athletes on the track and field, each one is eager and ready, showing no signs of weakness. High jumpers and long jumpers give their all in order to achieve better results, pushing themselves to the limit and never giving up even in the face of failure. They take firm steps towards their goals and keep jumping time after time.
English_Sentence_4o: Looking at the athletes on the track and field, each of them is raring to go, showing no signs of weakness. The high jumpers and long jumpers are giving their all for better results, never giving up even in the face of failure. They take firm steps toward their goals, jumping again and again.

Idiomatic_Sent: 如果说，农业时代的春耕秋收犹如给大地梳头，时代对资源的掠夺性开采，则把地球刨挖凿钻得百孔千疮，无疑于是对地球的敲骨吸髓。
en_meaning: to exploit someone to the fullest extent, squeezing out every last bit of benefit from them
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '如果说，农业时代的春耕秋收犹如给大地梳头，时代对资源的掠夺性开采，则把地球刨挖凿钻得百孔千疮，无疑于是对地球的敲骨吸髓。'
English_Sentence_3.5: If the spring plowing and autumn harvest of the agricultural era can be likened to combing the earth's hair, then the exploitative extraction of resources by the era is like digging, excavating, and drilling the earth into countless wounds, undoubtedly a bone-chilling and marrow-sucking act upon the earth.
English_Sentence_4o: If the spring plowing and autumn harvesting of the agricultural era were like combing the earth's hair, the exploitative extraction of resources in modern times has gouged and drilled the planet full of wounds, undoubtedly akin to sucking the marrow from its bones.

Idiomatic_Sent: 在敌人面前，刘胡兰坚贞不屈。
en_meaning: firm and unyielding; steadfast and resolute
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '在敌人面前，刘胡兰坚贞不屈。'
English_Sentence_3.5: In front of the enemy, Liu Hulan remained steadfast and unyielding.
English_Sentence_4o: In the face of the enemy, Liu Hulan remained steadfast and unyielding.

Idiomatic_Sent: 他们对这幅画赞不绝口。
en_meaning: praise without end
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '他们对这幅画赞不绝口。'
English_Sentence_3.5: They couldn't stop praising this painting.
English_Sentence_4o: They were full of praise for the painting.

Idiomatic_Sent: 我出生时你笑弯了腰，我读书时你累弯了腰，我成家立业时你手叉着腰，现在年老时你走路也要捶腰。在父亲节来临之际，祝天下所有的父亲幸福健康长寿！
en_meaning: establish a family and career, to settle down and achieve success
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '我出生时你笑弯了腰，我读书时你累弯了腰，我成家立业时你手叉着腰，现在年老时你走路也要捶腰。在父亲节来临之际，祝天下所有的父亲幸福健康长寿！'
English_Sentence_3.5: When I was born, you bent over laughing, when I was studying, you bent over tired, when I started a family and career, you stood with hands on hips, now in old age you even walk with a hunch. On the occasion of Father's Day, I wish all fathers in the world happiness, health, and longevity!
English_Sentence_4o: "When I was born, you bent over with laughter; when I was studying, you bent over with exhaustion; when I started a family and career, you stood with hands on your hips; and now in old age, you need to support your back while walking. On the occasion of Father's Day, I wish all fathers in the world happiness, health, and longevity!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 殿下可能不了解，人面临绝境时所能呈现出来的能力和勇气吧?既然横竖都是死，很多人都会将自身的潜能发挥到极致的，古语云，哀兵必胜。
en_meaning: An army that fights in desperation will surely win
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '殿下可能不了解，人面临绝境时所能呈现出来的能力和勇气吧?既然横竖都是死，很多人都会将自身的潜能发挥到极致的，古语云，哀兵必胜。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Your Highness may not understand the abilities and courage people can demonstrate when facing desperate situations. Since death is inevitable, many people will push their own potential to the limit. As the ancient saying goes, "A desperate soldier will win."
English_Sentence_4o: "Your Highness may not understand the capabilities and courage that people can show when faced with desperate situations. Since death is inevitable, many will push their potential to the limit. As the ancient saying goes, 'A desperate army is sure to win.'"

Idiomatic_Sent: 在敌人的法庭上，王若飞同志大义凛然，慷慨陈词。
en_meaning: upright and righteous; with a sense of justice and integrity
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '在敌人的法庭上，王若飞同志大义凛然，慷慨陈词。'
English_Sentence_3.5: In the enemy's court, Comrade Wang Ruofei stood upright with great righteousness, delivering a passionate speech.
English_Sentence_4o: "In the enemy's court, Comrade Wang Ruofei stood tall and spoke eloquently with great righteousness."

Idiomatic_Sent: 对我来说，这是一次发人深省的练习。
en_meaning: to provoke deep thought or reflection
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '对我来说，这是一次发人深省的练习。'
English_Sentence_3.5: For me, this is a thought-provoking exercise.
English_Sentence_4o: For me, this was a thought-provoking exercise.

Idiomatic_Sent: 那个人说话扭扭捏捏的，一点也不大方。
en_meaning: acting coy, hesitating or being indecisive
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '那个人说话扭扭捏捏的，一点也不大方。'
English_Sentence_3.5: That person speaks hesitantly and is not generous at all.
English_Sentence_4o: "That person speaks hesitantly and is not at all straightforward."

Idiomatic_Sent: 前王之御时也，沐雨栉风，拯其溺而救其焚，信赏必罚，安而利之，既与共其存亡，故得同其生死。
en_meaning: rewarding those who deserve it and punishing those who deserve it
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '前王之御时也，沐雨栉风，拯其溺而救其焚，信赏必罚，安而利之，既与共其存亡，故得同其生死。'
English_Sentence_3.5: During the reign of the former king, he endured rain and wind, rescued the drowning and saved those in danger of burning, rewarded the trustworthy and punished the wrongdoers, ensured peace and prosperity, shared the fate of life and death with the people, hence gaining their trust and loyalty.
English_Sentence_4o: "During the reign of the former king, they braved the elements, saved those in danger, rewarded and punished justly, ensured peace and prosperity, shared in survival and adversity, and thus shared life and death together."

Idiomatic_Sent: 高考在即，送去祝福，祝你在考场上，自信稳扎稳打，思路翻江倒海，智慧龙飞凤舞，大脑活蹦乱跳，心态四平八稳，钢笔翻飞疾书，成绩名列前茅，理想近在眼前。
en_meaning: steady and stable in all aspects
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '高考在即，送去祝福，祝你在考场上，自信稳扎稳打，思路翻江倒海，智慧龙飞凤舞，大脑活蹦乱跳，心态四平八稳，钢笔翻飞疾书，成绩名列前茅，理想近在眼前。'
English_Sentence_3.5: With the college entrance examination approaching, sending you blessings, wishing you confidence and stability in the exam room, with thoughts flowing freely, wisdom soaring, brain active, mindset steady, pen swiftly writing, achieving top grades, and your dreams within reach.
English_Sentence_4o: The college entrance exam is approaching, sending you blessings: may you be confident and steady in the exam, with thoughts surging like waves, wisdom soaring like dragons and phoenixes, a lively mind, a calm demeanor, a swiftly flying pen, top grades, and your dreams within reach.

Idiomatic_Sent: 这事关系到你的终身，怎能不三思而行？
en_meaning: Think thrice before you act
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '这事关系到你的终身，怎能不三思而行？'
English_Sentence_3.5: This matter concerns your future, how can you not think twice before acting?
English_Sentence_4o: This matter concerns your entire life; how can you not think twice before acting?

Idiomatic_Sent: 这里的大多数家庭，算我们在内，都属于中下阶层，不象东部下城区的犹太人那样赤贫如洗。
en_meaning: extremely poor
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '这里的大多数家庭，算我们在内，都属于中下阶层，不象东部下城区的犹太人那样赤贫如洗。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Most of the families here, including us, belong to the middle-lower class, unlike the Jewish people in the poor areas of the eastern downtown.
English_Sentence_4o: Most of the families here, including ours, belong to the lower-middle class and are not as impoverished as the Jews in the Lower East Side.

Idiomatic_Sent: 一年一度七夕日，牛郎织女鹊桥会。感天动地情深切，爱莫能助伤离别。你我凡间平常人，郎情妾意过一生。不羡鸳鸯不羡仙，安居乐业享团圆。
en_meaning: to be unable to offer assistance even though one wants to help
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '一年一度七夕日，牛郎织女鹊桥会。感天动地情深切，爱莫能助伤离别。你我凡间平常人，郎情妾意过一生。不羡鸳鸯不羡仙，安居乐业享团圆。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Once a year on Qi Xi day, the Cowherd and Weaver Girl meet at the Magpie Bridge. The deep love moves the heavens and the earth, but there is nothing we can do about the pain of separation. We are just ordinary people in the mortal world, sharing a lifetime of love. We do not envy mandarin ducks or immortals, as we find happiness and fulfillment in our peaceful and harmonious life.
English_Sentence_4o: "Once a year on Qixi Festival, the Cowherd and Weaver Girl meet on the Magpie Bridge. Their deep love moves heaven and earth, yet they remain helpless in their sorrowful parting. We, ordinary people in the mortal world, live a lifetime with mutual affection. We envy neither the mandarin ducks nor the immortals, content in our peaceful, prosperous, and united lives."

Idiomatic_Sent: 十年寒窗终圆梦，九亲十故来庆贺，八斗之才真给力，七月金榜提名时，六街三市齐关注，五味俱全各品尝，四山五岳入高校，三五成群谈理想，二话不说勤奋斗，一心求知终成才！
en_meaning: limited talent or ability
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '十年寒窗终圆梦，九亲十故来庆贺，八斗之才真给力，七月金榜提名时，六街三市齐关注，五味俱全各品尝，四山五岳入高校，三五成群谈理想，二话不说勤奋斗，一心求知终成才！'
English_Sentence_3.5: After ten years of hard work, the dream finally comes true. Friends and family gather to celebrate, showcasing great talent. When the list is posted in July, the whole town is watching. Enjoying all flavors, climbing the academic ladder. Discussing dreams in groups of three to five. Working diligently without hesitation, striving for knowledge with all our hearts, eventually becoming successful!
English_Sentence_4o: "After ten years of hard study, the dream is finally realized; relatives and friends come to celebrate; exceptional talent truly shines; in July, the names are listed in the golden rankings; the whole city pays attention; various emotions are tasted; entering top universities across the land; groups of friends discuss their aspirations; without hesitation, they work diligently; with a heart devoted to learning, they finally succeed!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 以至公无私之心，行正大光明之事。 #吕坤#
en_meaning: honest and upright, in a fair and open manner
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '以至公无私之心，行正大光明之事。 #吕坤#'
English_Sentence_3.5: With a heart of selflessness, carry out righteous and honorable deeds. #LvKun#
English_Sentence_4o: "With a heart of absolute fairness and selflessness, conduct acts of uprightness and integrity. #Lü Kun#"

Idiomatic_Sent: 将城市政府看作一个具有自己独立利益的经济实体，一个以经营城市为目标的企业，不仅仅是一种城市管理改革，更是经济改革的一大创举，它的产生不是人们心血来潮，而是有着市场经济发展的内在原因。
en_meaning: sudden impulse or inspiration
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '将城市政府看作一个具有自己独立利益的经济实体，一个以经营城市为目标的企业，不仅仅是一种城市管理改革，更是经济改革的一大创举，它的产生不是人们心血来潮，而是有着市场经济发展的内在原因。'
English_Sentence_3.5: To view the city government as an economic entity with its own independent interests, as a business aimed at managing the city, is not just a form of urban management reform, but also a major innovation in economic reform, its emergence is not a whim, but has inherent reasons in the development of the market economy.
English_Sentence_4o: "Viewing the city government as an economic entity with its own independent interests, a company aimed at managing the city, is not merely a reform in urban management but a significant innovation in economic reform. Its emergence is not a result of a whimsical idea but has intrinsic reasons rooted in the development of the market economy."

Idiomatic_Sent: 谁看得清你？既非门楼的敛眉顺目，温柔敦厚，亦非红砖白石主楼的富丽堂皇，威严肃穆。我只记得年少时，某个初夏雨后，在你的怀中，拾起的那枚白色玉兰，芬芳沁骨。 #李秋沅#
en_meaning: grand and magnificent in appearance or style
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '谁看得清你？既非门楼的敛眉顺目，温柔敦厚，亦非红砖白石主楼的富丽堂皇，威严肃穆。我只记得年少时，某个初夏雨后，在你的怀中，拾起的那枚白色玉兰，芬芳沁骨。 #李秋沅#'
English_Sentence_3.5: Who can see through you? Not the modest and gentle demeanor of the gatekeeper, nor the grand and imposing main building of red bricks and white stones. I only remember the young days, a certain early summer after the rain, picking up that white magnolia in your arms, its fragrance penetrating my bones. #Li Qiuyuan#
English_Sentence_4o: "Who can see you clearly? Neither the gentle and kind demeanor of the gatehouse nor the grand and solemn elegance of the main building with its red bricks and white stones. I only remember that in my youth, after an early summer rain, I picked up a white magnolia in your embrace, its fragrance penetrating my bones. #Li Qiuyuan#"

Idiomatic_Sent: 在人世间，要幸福只有一条路。不是怀着大公无私的良心，便是完全不怀良心。
en_meaning: selfless and impartial
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '在人世间，要幸福只有一条路。不是怀着大公无私的良心，便是完全不怀良心。'
English_Sentence_3.5: In this world, there is only one path to happiness. It is either with a selfless and noble heart, or with no conscience at all.
English_Sentence_4o: "In the human world, there is only one path to happiness: either with a selfless conscience or none at all."

Idiomatic_Sent: 风雨无情人有情，亲友关爱化残冰，困苦来临摇树影，艰险值得你叮咛，岁月蹉跎杨柳青，桃花潭水伴我行，天寒地冻血与风，唯你帮我数寒冷，肝胆相照喜气腾，幸福快乐绽花容，勤劳的你爱劳动，五一收获好风景！
en_meaning: be extremely close and loyal to each other, willing to sacrifice for each other
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '风雨无情人有情，亲友关爱化残冰，困苦来临摇树影，艰险值得你叮咛，岁月蹉跎杨柳青，桃花潭水伴我行，天寒地冻血与风，唯你帮我数寒冷，肝胆相照喜气腾，幸福快乐绽花容，勤劳的你爱劳动，五一收获好风景！'
English_Sentence_3.5: In the face of harsh winds and rain, people show their kindness; the warmth of family and friends melts the ice. Difficulties may come, but your perseverance is worth reminding. Time passes by, the willows remain green; with peach blossom waters by my side, I endure the cold and wind, only you can count the chill with me. With mutual support and joy, happiness blossoms; your hard work in labor brings a rewarding May Day scenery.
English_Sentence_4o: "Though wind and rain are merciless, people are compassionate; the care of relatives and friends thaws the ice; in times of hardship, shadows shake; your warnings are valuable in peril; time passes, willow trees turn green; the waters of Peach Blossom Pool accompany me; in the cold and frost, blood and wind, only you help me count the cold; with mutual understanding, joy abounds; happiness and joy bloom; you who are diligent love to work, and on May Day, we reap beautiful scenery!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 拥有斗志的人始终保持乐观向上积极进取的心态，调整身心，不断完善自己的才能与实力，敢于拼搏挑战，这种人堪称智者。经不起放浪的人总是心灰意冷悲观怯懦以及自怨自艾，一遭打击就一蹶不振，此为无勇亦无智者。
en_meaning: to be unable to recover after a setback or failure
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '拥有斗志的人始终保持乐观向上积极进取的心态，调整身心，不断完善自己的才能与实力，敢于拼搏挑战，这种人堪称智者。经不起放浪的人总是心灰意冷悲观怯懦以及自怨自艾，一遭打击就一蹶不振，此为无勇亦无智者。'
English_Sentence_3.5: People with fighting spirit always maintain an optimistic, positive and proactive attitude, adjust their mind and body, constantly improve their talents and strengths, dare to challenge and strive, these people can be called wise. Those who cannot withstand wandering are always discouraged, pessimistic, cowardly, self-pitying, and collapse after a setback, they are neither brave nor wise.
English_Sentence_4o: A person with fighting spirit always maintains an optimistic, positive, and enterprising attitude, adjusts their body and mind, continuously improves their talents and abilities, and dares to strive and challenge; such a person can be called wise. Those who cannot withstand indulgence are always disheartened, pessimistic, cowardly, and self-pitying, collapsing at the first setback; this is a person without courage or wisdom.

Idiomatic_Sent: 锲而舍之，朽木不折；锲而不舍，金石可镂。人类学会走路，也得学会摔跤，而且只有经过摔跤他才能学会走路。
en_meaning: perseverance; to keep working hard and not give up easily
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '锲而舍之，朽木不折；锲而不舍，金石可镂。人类学会走路，也得学会摔跤，而且只有经过摔跤他才能学会走路。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Persist in striving, even a decayed wood will not break; persist without giving up, even gold and stone can be carved. Humans must learn to walk, but they must also learn to wrestle, and only through wrestling can they learn to walk.
English_Sentence_4o: "Chisel and give up, and even rotten wood won't break; chisel without giving up, and even metal and stone can be engraved. Humans must learn to walk, and also learn to fall, and only by falling can they learn to walk."

Idiomatic_Sent: 他常苦口婆心地劝导我要好好学习。
en_meaning: giving sincere advice or heartfelt persuasion
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '他常苦口婆心地劝导我要好好学习。'
English_Sentence_3.5: He often advises me earnestly to study hard.
English_Sentence_4o: "He often earnestly advises me to study hard."

Idiomatic_Sent: 在谢泼德所处的时代，强盗在光天化日、众目睽睽之下拦路抢劫，还大摇大摆、得意洋洋地招摇过市，如入无人之境。
en_meaning: under the watchful eyes of the public, in full view of everyone
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '在谢泼德所处的时代，强盗在光天化日、众目睽睽之下拦路抢劫，还大摇大摆、得意洋洋地招摇过市，如入无人之境。'
English_Sentence_3.5: During the time of Xiè Pōdé, bandits openly robbed people in broad daylight and in full view of the public, swaggering and flaunting their success as if they were in a lawless land.
English_Sentence_4o: In Shepherd's era, robbers would waylay people in broad daylight and swagger through the streets with an air of arrogance, as if they were in an uninhabited land.

Idiomatic_Sent: 在比赛中，我们应相机行事。
en_meaning: act with caution and consideration
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '在比赛中，我们应相机行事。'
English_Sentence_3.5: In the competition, we should act cautiously.
English_Sentence_4o: "In the competition, we should act according to circumstances."

Idiomatic_Sent: 她外表妍姿艳质，冷若冰霜的气质却教人望而却步，如今佳人有难，正是大献殷勤的好机会……
en_meaning: beautiful and attractive appearance, with a graceful demeanor
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '她外表妍姿艳质，冷若冰霜的气质却教人望而却步，如今佳人有难，正是大献殷勤的好机会……'
English_Sentence_3.5: Her appearance is beautiful and enchanting, but her icy demeanor makes people hesitate; now that the beauty is in trouble, it's a great opportunity to show affection.
English_Sentence_4o: "Her appearance is beautiful and enchanting, but her frosty demeanor deters people from approaching; now that the beauty is in trouble, it is a perfect opportunity to offer earnest help..."

Idiomatic_Sent: 大成若缺，其用不弊。大盈若冲，其用不穷。大直若屈。大巧若拙。大辩若讷。静胜躁，寒胜热。清静为天下正。
en_meaning: skillful and clever, appearing clumsy or naive
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '大成若缺，其用不弊。大盈若冲，其用不穷。大直若屈。大巧若拙。大辩若讷。静胜躁，寒胜热。清静为天下正。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Great perfection seems imperfect, yet its usefulness is not impaired. Great fullness seems empty, yet its usefulness is not exhausted. Great straightness seems crooked. Great skill seems clumsy. Great eloquence seems awkward. Restraint conquers recklessness, coolness conquers heat. Calmness and clarity are the standards of the world.
English_Sentence_4o: Great accomplishment seems incomplete, yet its use is never exhausted. Great fullness seems empty, yet its use is never ending. Great straightness seems bent. Great skill seems clumsy. Great eloquence seems hesitant. Stillness overcomes restlessness, cold overcomes heat. Clarity and stillness are the standards of the world.

Idiomatic_Sent: 自小被母亲遗弃，寄人篱下，为生存养成卑躬屈膝，奉迎他人，却又急切想扬眉吐气的性格。
en_meaning: to humble oneself and submit to someone else's authority or demands
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '自小被母亲遗弃，寄人篱下，为生存养成卑躬屈膝，奉迎他人，却又急切想扬眉吐气的性格。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Abandoned by my mother since childhood, I was taken in by others and developed a personality of being subservient and deferential in order to survive, while also yearning to assert myself.
English_Sentence_4o: "Abandoned by his mother since childhood and living under the mercy of others, he developed a servile and ingratiating manner to survive, yet yearned eagerly to hold his head high."

Idiomatic_Sent: 国庆普天同庆，三山五岳欢腾。自古国家一统，从来家国一体。家安国太平，家和万事兴。携手共建幸福长城，齐心同享美好人生。纵情放飞祝福，真心愿你幸福。祝你国庆快乐，合家安康，美满又幸福！
en_meaning: universal celebration
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '国庆普天同庆，三山五岳欢腾。自古国家一统，从来家国一体。家安国太平，家和万事兴。携手共建幸福长城，齐心同享美好人生。纵情放飞祝福，真心愿你幸福。祝你国庆快乐，合家安康，美满又幸福！'
English_Sentence_3.5: National Day is a time for universal celebration, with the Three Mountains and Five Sacred Mountains rejoicing. Since ancient times, a unified country has always meant unity between family and nation. When the family is safe, the country is at peace, and when the family is harmonious, all things prosper. Let's work together to build a happy Great Wall, and share a beautiful life with united hearts. Let your blessings soar freely, sincere wishes for your happiness. Wishing you a happy National Day, a healthy and happy family, full of joy and happiness!
English_Sentence_4o: "On National Day, the whole country celebrates together, and all the mountains and rivers rejoice. Since ancient times, the nation has been unified, and the family and country are one. With a peaceful family comes a prosperous nation, and harmony in the family brings success in all things. Let us join hands to build a Great Wall of happiness and share a beautiful life together. Send your blessings with all your heart, and sincerely wish you happiness. Wishing you a happy National Day, family well-being, and a life full of joy and happiness!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 朕躬广开言路，原要身致太平，不意廷臣所上奏本，类多毛举细故，无关宏旨。
en_meaning: irrelevant to the main point
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '朕躬广开言路，原要身致太平，不意廷臣所上奏本，类多毛举细故，无关宏旨。'
English_Sentence_3.5: I personally have opened up the path of speech widely, originally aiming for peace and harmony, but unexpectedly the courtiers have presented numerous trivial matters in their reports, which are irrelevant to the main objective.
English_Sentence_4o: "I have broadly opened channels for advice, originally aiming to bring about peace, but unexpectedly, many of the memorials submitted by court officials are trivial and irrelevant to the main purpose."

Idiomatic_Sent: 我们怎么能听凭这种人浮于事的现象继续下去呢？
en_meaning: too many people to do a job, usually leading to inefficiency or confusion
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '我们怎么能听凭这种人浮于事的现象继续下去呢？'
English_Sentence_3.5: How can we allow this superficial phenomenon to continue?
English_Sentence_4o: How can we allow this phenomenon of people avoiding responsibilities to continue?

Idiomatic_Sent: 绛雪眼明手快，上前将他扶住，她目光忽起忽落，泪流满面，却也是为聂小凤此刻的彻底决绝而怵目惊心。
en_meaning: tears streaming down one's face
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '绛雪眼明手快，上前将他扶住，她目光忽起忽落，泪流满面，却也是为聂小凤此刻的彻底决绝而怵目惊心。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Jiang Xue's eyes were sharp and quick, she quickly went up to support him, her gaze flickering, tears streaming down her face, but also shocked by Nie Xiao Feng's complete determination at this moment.
English_Sentence_4o: "Jiang Xue, with quick eyes and swift hands, stepped forward to support him; her gaze flickered, and tears streamed down her face, yet she was also horrified by Nie Xiaofeng's utter resolve at that moment."

Idiomatic_Sent: 这位相貌堂堂的男子虽然衣冠楚楚地坐在那里，但是看见冰清玉洁的她，早已心猿意马。
en_meaning: pure and pristine, without any blemish or impurity
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '这位相貌堂堂的男子虽然衣冠楚楚地坐在那里，但是看见冰清玉洁的她，早已心猿意马。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Although this handsome man sat there looking very dignified, he was already captivated by her pure and graceful appearance.
English_Sentence_4o: "Although the handsome man sat there impeccably dressed, his mind was already wandering upon seeing her pure and graceful beauty."

Idiomatic_Sent: 白露享百禄，百禄有百喜，百喜保百寿，百寿得百福。白露到了，送你福禄寿喜四张王牌，祝你身体百炼成钢，意志百折不挠，事业百尺竿头，心情百花齐放！
en_meaning: reaching the top of a tall pole or achieving a high level of success
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '白露享百禄，百禄有百喜，百喜保百寿，百寿得百福。白露到了，送你福禄寿喜四张王牌，祝你身体百炼成钢，意志百折不挠，事业百尺竿头，心情百花齐放！'
English_Sentence_3.5: Bailu brings blessings, blessings bring happiness, happiness brings longevity, longevity brings fortune. When Bailu arrives, I send you the four aces of blessings, prosperity, longevity, and happiness, wishing you a body of steel, unwavering willpower, a successful career, and a joyful heart!
English_Sentence_4o: "White Dew brings a hundred blessings, a hundred blessings bring a hundred joys, a hundred joys ensure a hundred years of life, a hundred years bring a hundred fortunes. With the arrival of White Dew, I send you the four aces of fortune, prosperity, longevity, and happiness, wishing you a body as strong as steel, an indomitable spirit, a career reaching new heights, and a heart blooming like a hundred flowers!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 茫茫大海中你给我们指明了前进的方向，逐日寇求解放功德无量；滚滚浪潮中你把握住前行的双桨，重科技奔小康民富国强。建党节到了，让我们高声歌唱，祝愿伟大的党永远辉煌！
en_meaning: prosperity of the people leads to a strong nation
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '茫茫大海中你给我们指明了前进的方向，逐日寇求解放功德无量；滚滚浪潮中你把握住前行的双桨，重科技奔小康民富国强。建党节到了，让我们高声歌唱，祝愿伟大的党永远辉煌！'
English_Sentence_3.5: In the vast sea, you have shown us the direction to move forward, tirelessly fighting for liberation with boundless merits; in the rolling waves, you grasp the twin oars of progress, propelling science and technology towards a prosperous society and a strong nation. As the Party founding day approaches, let us sing loudly and wish the great Party eternal glory!
English_Sentence_4o: "In the vast sea, you have shown us the direction to move forward, tirelessly seeking liberation with immeasurable merit; in the surging waves, you have held the oars steady, advancing technology and striving for prosperity, enriching the people and strengthening the nation. As the Party's Founding Day arrives, let us sing loudly and wish the great Party eternal glory!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 微博上多笨多傻多聪明多睿智的人都有，需要见怪不怪，但记住一点：SB不是你生的，你没有教育的责任。 #琢磨先生#
en_meaning: not surprised or shocked by strange or unusual things
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '微博上多笨多傻多聪明多睿智的人都有，需要见怪不怪，但记住一点：SB不是你生的，你没有教育的责任。 #琢磨先生#'
English_Sentence_3.5: There are many stupid, foolish, intelligent, and wise people on Weibo. It's important to not be surprised, but remember one thing: being stupid is not your fault, you are not responsible for their education. #Mr. Zhuomo#
English_Sentence_4o: 'There are all kinds of people on Weibo: dumb, silly, smart, wise. You need to take everything in stride, but remember one thing: SB is not your child, you have no responsibility to educate them. #MrZhuomo#'

Idiomatic_Sent: 考试已迫在眉睫，你还不抓紧复习？
en_meaning: imminent, pressing, or urgent
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '考试已迫在眉睫，你还不抓紧复习？'
English_Sentence_3.5: The exam is just around the corner, why aren't you studying hard?
English_Sentence_4o: "The exam is imminent, why aren't you hurrying to review?"

Idiomatic_Sent: 连一技之长都没有，你怎么安身立命呢?
en_meaning: a skill or expertise in a particular area
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '连一技之长都没有，你怎么安身立命呢?'
English_Sentence_3.5: Without even a single skill, how do you plan to make a living?
English_Sentence_4o: "Without even a single skill, how can you make a living?"

Idiomatic_Sent: 碧绿的河面上荡漾着波纹，像是被太阳晒得不高兴了，皱起了眉头。此时的太阳恋恋不舍地把一点儿余辉洒在水面上，正好照在波纹上，像一片片金色的鱼鳞。
en_meaning: reluctant to part; unwilling to say goodbye
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '碧绿的河面上荡漾着波纹，像是被太阳晒得不高兴了，皱起了眉头。此时的太阳恋恋不舍地把一点儿余辉洒在水面上，正好照在波纹上，像一片片金色的鱼鳞。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The emerald green river rippled as if displeased by the sun, furrowing its brow. The sun reluctantly sprinkled a bit of its afterglow on the water, shining directly on the ripples like golden fish scales.
English_Sentence_4o: "Ripples spread across the emerald green river, as if the sun had displeased it, causing it to furrow its brows. At this moment, the sun reluctantly cast a bit of its remaining glow onto the water, illuminating the ripples like golden fish scales."

Idiomatic_Sent: 关于俭约自守、力戒奢华的思想，关于中和、泰和、求同存异、和而不同、和谐相处的思想，关于安不忘危、存不忘亡、治不忘乱、居安思危的思想，等等。
en_meaning: Stay alert and cautious even in times of peace.
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '关于俭约自守、力戒奢华的思想，关于中和、泰和、求同存异、和而不同、和谐相处的思想，关于安不忘危、存不忘亡、治不忘乱、居安思危的思想，等等。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Ideas related to frugality and self-restraint, avoiding extravagance, ideas of moderation, harmony, seeking common ground while respecting differences, coexisting harmoniously, being prepared for danger in times of peace, remembering past losses, not forgetting disorder in times of order, and so on.
English_Sentence_4o: About the ideas of frugality and self-restraint, the avoidance of luxury, the principles of moderation and harmony, seeking common ground while reserving differences, harmonious coexistence, and the concepts of remaining vigilant in times of peace, remembering danger in times of safety, maintaining awareness of potential chaos during governance, and being cautious even when in a stable situation, etc.

Idiomatic_Sent: 重庆解放前夕，狗急跳墙的国民党反动派屠杀了大批共产党员和进步人士。
en_meaning: desperate people will resort to desperate measures
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '重庆解放前夕，狗急跳墙的国民党反动派屠杀了大批共产党员和进步人士。'
English_Sentence_3.5: On the eve of the liberation of Chongqing, the desperate Nationalist reactionaries slaughtered a large number of Communist Party members and progressives.
English_Sentence_4o: "On the eve of Chongqing's liberation, the desperate Kuomintang reactionaries massacred a large number of Communist Party members and progressives."

Idiomatic_Sent: 相信只要以上双管齐下，一个安全健康的电子商务环境指日可待。
en_meaning: to use two methods or strategies simultaneously for a better result
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '相信只要以上双管齐下，一个安全健康的电子商务环境指日可待。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Believe that with both sides working together, a safe and healthy e-commerce environment is just around the corner.
English_Sentence_4o: "Believe that as long as we tackle both aspects simultaneously, a safe and healthy e-commerce environment is just around the corner."

Idiomatic_Sent: 透过书籍，我可以以主人翁的姿态去观察百般生态，去感知风花雪月，去领略高山流水，去体验世态炎凉。
en_meaning: romantic and beautiful scenery
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '透过书籍，我可以以主人翁的姿态去观察百般生态，去感知风花雪月，去领略高山流水，去体验世态炎凉。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Through books, I can observe various ecosystems as a protagonist, perceive the beauty of nature, appreciate the mountains and rivers, and experience the ups and downs of the world.
English_Sentence_4o: "Through books, I can observe various forms of life with the perspective of a protagonist, sense the beauty of nature, appreciate the majesty of mountains and rivers, and experience the vicissitudes of the world."

Idiomatic_Sent: 地球上最富有的国家，没有人可以威胁到你的地位，那么你与盟国间就没有同仇敌忾的天然联合力。
en_meaning: united in a common cause, despite personal differences or conflicts
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '地球上最富有的国家，没有人可以威胁到你的地位，那么你与盟国间就没有同仇敌忾的天然联合力。'
English_Sentence_3.5: If your country is the wealthiest on Earth and no one can threaten your position, then you lack the natural unity of common enemies with your allies.
English_Sentence_4o: 'In the richest country on Earth, no one can threaten your position, so there is no natural solidarity with your allies against a common enemy.'

Idiomatic_Sent: 我们的老板是个铁公鸡.他招待我们一顿可真是千载难逢.
en_meaning: a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '我们的老板是个铁公鸡.他招待我们一顿可真是千载难逢.'
English_Sentence_3.5: Our boss is a stingy person. It's truly a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity for him to treat us to a meal.
English_Sentence_4o: 'Our boss is a real penny-pincher. It's a once-in-a-lifetime event for him to treat us to a meal.'

Idiomatic_Sent: 得道多助，失道寡助，你伤天害理，杀人放火，就算今天没人帮我抓住你，早晚有一天也会有人出手，正义永远都站在我这边。
en_meaning: Receiving help and support when one is in a position of power or authority; also refers to the idea that people are more willing to assist those who are successful or have power
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '得道多助，失道寡助，你伤天害理，杀人放火，就算今天没人帮我抓住你，早晚有一天也会有人出手，正义永远都站在我这边。'
English_Sentence_3.5: With the right path comes much assistance, with the wrong path comes little assistance. You have violated the laws of heaven and earth, committing crimes like murder and arson. Even if no one catches you today, someone will eventually take action. Justice will always be on my side.
English_Sentence_4o: "Those who follow the right path gain much support, while those who deviate from it have little help. You have committed atrocities and set fires; even if no one helps me catch you today, sooner or later someone will step in. Justice will always be on my side."

Idiomatic_Sent: 关于足球，小明向来喜欢纸上谈兵，一跟别人谈起足球就兴高采烈，常常说得跟他观点不一样的同学哑口无言。
en_meaning: be in high spirits; be filled with joy and excitement
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '关于足球，小明向来喜欢纸上谈兵，一跟别人谈起足球就兴高采烈，常常说得跟他观点不一样的同学哑口无言。'
English_Sentence_3.5: When it comes to soccer, Xiaoming always likes to talk a big game on paper. He gets excited when talking about soccer with others, often leaving classmates speechless with his differing opinions.
English_Sentence_4o: When it comes to soccer, Xiaoming has always liked to be an armchair strategist; whenever he talks about soccer, he gets very excited and often leaves classmates who disagree with him speechless.

Idiomatic_Sent: 知己知彼，才能百战百胜；如果盲人瞎马，横冲直撞，是非常危险的。
en_meaning: to win every battle; to have a perfect record in competing or fighting
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '知己知彼，才能百战百胜；如果盲人瞎马，横冲直撞，是非常危险的。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Know yourself and know your enemy, and you will be victorious in a hundred battles; if you charge blindly like a blind man riding a blind horse, it is extremely dangerous.
English_Sentence_4o: "To know yourself and your enemy is the key to winning every battle; if a blind man rides a blind horse, recklessly charging ahead, it is extremely dangerous."

Idiomatic_Sent: 文明是书，百读不厌；文明如花，满园芬芳；文明似酒，恒久醇香；文明若水，至清至善；文明如滴，汇成江海；文明像灯，照亮黑暗；文明有你，传递处处！
en_meaning: a book that can be read over and over again without getting tired of it
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '文明是书，百读不厌；文明如花，满园芬芳；文明似酒，恒久醇香；文明若水，至清至善；文明如滴，汇成江海；文明像灯，照亮黑暗；文明有你，传递处处！'
English_Sentence_3.5: Civilization is like a book, never tired of reading; civilization is like a flower, full of fragrance in the garden; civilization is like wine, always mellow and fragrant; civilization is like water, pure and virtuous; civilization is like drops, forming rivers and seas; civilization is like a lamp, illuminating the darkness; civilization with you, spreading everywhere!
English_Sentence_4o: Civilization is a book, never tiring to read; civilization is like a flower, filling the garden with fragrance; civilization is like wine, enduring and mellow; civilization is like water, supremely pure and good; civilization is like a drop, converging into rivers and seas; civilization is like a lamp, illuminating the darkness; with you, civilization spreads everywhere!

Idiomatic_Sent: 还经常看到两夫妇为了买什么款式的灯具而争得面红耳赤，最后不欢而散。
en_meaning: blush with embarrassment or shame
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '还经常看到两夫妇为了买什么款式的灯具而争得面红耳赤，最后不欢而散。'
English_Sentence_3.5: I often see a couple arguing heatedly over what style of lighting fixture to buy, only to end up leaving in anger.
English_Sentence_4o: "It is also common to see couples arguing heatedly over which style of lighting to buy, ultimately parting on bad terms."

Idiomatic_Sent: 未免凌然困兽犹斗且背水一战反击二人，二人联名写密信给驻扎在离岛璃晓城中的凌然，劝他不如与他们联手对抗天晟朝廷，然三人三分天下成鼎足之势。
en_meaning: Equal balance of power among three parties
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '未免凌然困兽犹斗且背水一战反击二人，二人联名写密信给驻扎在离岛璃晓城中的凌然，劝他不如与他们联手对抗天晟朝廷，然三人三分天下成鼎足之势。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Unable to endure the situation any longer, the cornered beast fought back against the two people, who then wrote a secret letter together to persuade the besieged Lingran in the city of Lixiaocheng on the offshore island to join forces with them in resisting the Tiancheng court, thus forming a powerful alliance of three equal parties.
English_Sentence_4o: "To counterattack the two men, who despite being cornered still fought back fiercely, Ling Ran decided to take a desperate stand. The two men jointly wrote a secret letter to Ling Ran, who was stationed in Lixiao City on the island, persuading him to join forces with them against the Tian Sheng court, so that the three of them could divide the world into three parts and form a tripartite balance of power."

Idiomatic_Sent: 和一位结交半个多世纪的良师益友诀别，悲痛之情是难以尽述的。
en_meaning: Good teacher and helpful friend
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '和一位结交半个多世纪的良师益友诀别，悲痛之情是难以尽述的。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Parting with a mentor and friend of over half a century is a sorrow beyond words.
English_Sentence_4o: "To bid farewell to a mentor and friend of over half a century is an indescribable sorrow."

Idiomatic_Sent: 公司现在是豺狼当道，还是忍耐一点，明哲保身吧！
en_meaning: protecting oneself by being cautious and avoiding trouble
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '公司现在是豺狼当道，还是忍耐一点，明哲保身吧！'
English_Sentence_3.5: The company is currently a dog-eat-dog world, so it's better to be patient and protect oneself wisely.
English_Sentence_4o: "The company is now run by jackals and wolves, so it's better to endure a little and protect yourself."

Idiomatic_Sent: 做人的思想工作，切莫操之过急。
en_meaning: to be too impatient and hasty in dealing with something
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '做人的思想工作，切莫操之过急。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Do not rush the mental work of being a person.
English_Sentence_4o: When doing ideological work with people, one must not rush things.

Idiomatic_Sent: 爆竹声声，马年到！祝你事事马到成功，健康一马当先，财源马不停蹄，好运万马奔腾，生活一马平川，爱情走马观花，业绩快马加鞭，仕途策马扬鞭，成就驷马难追！最后祝你马年快乐！
en_meaning: making an extra effort to speed up or push oneself harder
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '爆竹声声，马年到！祝你事事马到成功，健康一马当先，财源马不停蹄，好运万马奔腾，生活一马平川，爱情走马观花，业绩快马加鞭，仕途策马扬鞭，成就驷马难追！最后祝你马年快乐！'
English_Sentence_3.5: The sound of firecrackers, the Year of the Horse has arrived! Wishing you success in everything, leading in health, continuous wealth, abundant good luck, smooth sailing in life, a fleeting love, accelerated performance, advancing in career, and achieving unparalleled success! Finally, wishing you a happy Year of the Horse!
English_Sentence_4o: Firecrackers crackle, the Year of the Horse arrives! Wishing you instant success in all endeavors, good health leading the way, continuous financial gains, a rush of good luck, a smooth life, a love life full of fleeting pleasures, rapid progress in your performance, a swift career advancement, and achievements that are hard to surpass! Finally, happy Year of the Horse!

Idiomatic_Sent: 来到“战场”，我看到了一群蚂蚁在向一只庞大的螳螂进攻。我震惊了，心想弱小的蚂蚁怎能敌得过螳螂，不忍心看下去这场原本就知道结果的斗争，打算离开却被蚂蚁的坚持不懈对螳螂发起进攻所吸引，想知道这场斗争的结果。
en_meaning: perseverance; to persist without giving up
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '来到“战场”，我看到了一群蚂蚁在向一只庞大的螳螂进攻。我震惊了，心想弱小的蚂蚁怎能敌得过螳螂，不忍心看下去这场原本就知道结果的斗争，打算离开却被蚂蚁的坚持不懈对螳螂发起进攻所吸引，想知道这场斗争的结果。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Arriving at the "battlefield", I saw a group of ants attacking a huge mantis. Shocked, I wondered how the small ants could possibly defeat the mantis. Unable to bear watching the inevitable outcome of the struggle, I planned to leave but was drawn by the ants' relentless attack on the mantis, wanting to know the result of this battle.
English_Sentence_4o: Arriving at the "battlefield," I saw a group of ants attacking a huge mantis. I was shocked and thought to myself, how could the weak ants possibly defeat the mantis? Unwilling to watch a battle whose outcome seemed predetermined, I was about to leave but was drawn back by the ants' relentless attack on the mantis, wanting to see the outcome of this struggle.

Idiomatic_Sent: 其势汹汹的小蛇气息一窒，瘫软下去，薛无尘食指连弹，打得蛇身痉挛颤栗，眼看不活了。
en_meaning: to appear in a threatening or overwhelming manner
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '其势汹汹的小蛇气息一窒，瘫软下去，薛无尘食指连弹，打得蛇身痉挛颤栗，眼看不活了。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The fiercely aggressive little snake suddenly choked, went limp, and Xue Wuchen's index finger flicked continuously, causing the snake's body to convulse and tremble, on the brink of death.
English_Sentence_4o: "The menacing little snake's breath halted, and it collapsed limply. Xue Wuchen flicked his index finger repeatedly, causing the snake's body to convulse and shudder; it was clearly on the brink of death."

Idiomatic_Sent: 那些养尊处优，睚眦必报，利欲熏心的薄情寡义之徒，有几人能安享长寿？
en_meaning: to seek revenge for the smallest grievance
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '那些养尊处优，睚眦必报，利欲熏心的薄情寡义之徒，有几人能安享长寿？'
English_Sentence_3.5: How many of those who lead a pampered life, hold grudges, are consumed by greed, and lack basic human decency can truly enjoy a long life?
English_Sentence_4o: "How many of those pampered, vengeful, and selfishly greedy heartless people can enjoy a long life in peace?"

Idiomatic_Sent: 如果你也像我这么一般在意，那么你会感同身受。
en_meaning: empathize, feel someone's pain as if it were one's own
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '如果你也像我这么一般在意，那么你会感同身受。'
English_Sentence_3.5: If you also care as much as I do, then you will empathize.
English_Sentence_4o: If you care as much as I do, then you will empathize.

Idiomatic_Sent: 不管学习什么知识都要仔细琢磨，深刻领会，千万不能囫囵吞枣只学皮毛。
en_meaning: to swallow something whole without understanding it; to accept something without question
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '不管学习什么知识都要仔细琢磨，深刻领会，千万不能囫囵吞枣只学皮毛。'
English_Sentence_3.5: No matter what knowledge you are studying, you must carefully ponder and deeply understand it, and never just skim the surface.
English_Sentence_4o: "No matter what knowledge you are learning, you must study it carefully and understand it deeply; never superficially grasp it like swallowing a date whole."

Idiomatic_Sent: 目下政以贿成，豺狼当道，我即或在这里再多住几时，也不见得有甚么利益。
en_meaning: corrupt and ruthless people in power
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '目下政以贿成，豺狼当道，我即或在这里再多住几时，也不见得有甚么利益。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Currently, corruption prevails and wolves are in power. Even if I were to stay here for a longer time, there may not necessarily be any benefit.
English_Sentence_4o: "At present, politics are conducted through bribery, and scoundrels are in power. Even if I stay here longer, it won't necessarily bring any benefit."

Idiomatic_Sent: 初中生活，如诗如歌，让人回味无穷；初中生活，如花似玉，让人爱意心生；初中生活，如花似锦，让人心花怒放。
en_meaning: beautiful and radiant, like flowers and brocade
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '初中生活，如诗如歌，让人回味无穷；初中生活，如花似玉，让人爱意心生；初中生活，如花似锦，让人心花怒放。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Middle school life, like poetry and song, leaves endless memories; middle school life, like flowers and jade, sparks love in one's heart; middle school life, like a blooming flower, makes one's heart blossom with joy.
English_Sentence_4o: Middle school life is like poetry and song, leaving endless aftertastes; middle school life is like flowers and jade, filling hearts with love; middle school life is like a blooming garden, making hearts burst with joy.

Idiomatic_Sent: 必要时，政府应该采取断然措施，伸张公权力，严格处置那些违法乱纪的害群之马。
en_meaning: breaking the law and violating discipline
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '必要时，政府应该采取断然措施，伸张公权力，严格处置那些违法乱纪的害群之马。'
English_Sentence_3.5: When necessary, the government should take decisive measures, wield public authority, and strictly deal with those troublemakers who break the law and disrupt order.
English_Sentence_4o: "When necessary, the government should take decisive measures, assert public authority, and strictly deal with those lawbreakers who disrupt social order."

Idiomatic_Sent: 每个人都有自己的故事，任何人都不应该轻易发表言论，也没有权利去评头品足。
en_meaning: criticizing or nitpicking; excessively focusing on minor details and flaws
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '每个人都有自己的故事，任何人都不应该轻易发表言论，也没有权利去评头品足。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Everyone has their own story, and no one should speak lightly or have the right to judge others.
English_Sentence_4o: Everyone has their own story, and no one should easily make comments or has the right to criticize.

Idiomatic_Sent: 鉴于银行是外汇市场上的重量级参与者，任何公正无私的调查应该也针对它们才对。
en_meaning: fair and impartial
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '鉴于银行是外汇市场上的重量级参与者，任何公正无私的调查应该也针对它们才对。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Given that banks are heavyweight participants in the foreign exchange market, any fair and impartial investigation should also target them.
English_Sentence_4o: Given that banks are heavyweight participants in the foreign exchange market, any fair and impartial investigation should also target them.

Idiomatic_Sent: 画面效果黑白分明，树下茅亭内行人停车小憩，安然自在。
en_meaning: clearly distinguishing right from wrong, black and white
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '画面效果黑白分明，树下茅亭内行人停车小憩，安然自在。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The black and white contrast in the picture is clear, with pedestrians stopping to rest in the thatched pavilion under the tree, feeling peaceful and at ease.
English_Sentence_4o: "The visual effect is strikingly black and white, with travelers stopping to rest peacefully in a thatched pavilion under the tree."

Idiomatic_Sent: 这些人表面上道貌岸然，暗地裡却是偷鸡摸狗，寡廉鲜耻！
en_meaning: stealing chickens and touching dogs
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '这些人表面上道貌岸然，暗地裡却是偷鸡摸狗，寡廉鲜耻！'
English_Sentence_3.5: These people may seem upright on the surface, but in reality they are engaging in dishonest and immoral behavior!
English_Sentence_4o: "These people appear morally upright on the surface, but secretly they engage in petty and shameful acts without any sense of shame!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 北雁南飞，秋收冬藏，一天更比一天凉，注意保暖添衣裳；走南闯北，山高水长，路漫漫兮人忙忙，保重身体要健康！祝你每天如意吉祥！
en_meaning: traveled extensively, going to different places
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '北雁南飞，秋收冬藏，一天更比一天凉，注意保暖添衣裳；走南闯北，山高水长，路漫漫兮人忙忙，保重身体要健康！祝你每天如意吉祥！'
English_Sentence_3.5: The geese fly south, the autumn harvest and winter storage, each day colder than the last, pay attention to keeping warm and adding clothes; traveling north and south, mountains high and rivers long, the road is long and people are busy, take care of your health! Wishing you good luck every day!
English_Sentence_4o: "Geese fly south, autumn harvests and winter stores, each day gets colder, so keep warm and add clothing; traveling north and south, through high mountains and long rivers, the road is long and people are busy, take care of your health to stay well! Wishing you good fortune and happiness every day!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 有一天苏格拉底刚一进家门，很是莫名其妙，他的老婆就对他唠叨不休，接著就是破口大骂，言语不堪入耳。
en_meaning: to curse or scold loudly and forcefully
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '有一天苏格拉底刚一进家门，很是莫名其妙，他的老婆就对他唠叨不休，接著就是破口大骂，言语不堪入耳。'
English_Sentence_3.5: One day when Socrates just walked through the door, to his utter surprise, his wife started nagging at him incessantly, then proceeded to curse at him, using foul language that was unbearable to hear.
English_Sentence_4o: One day, just as Socrates entered the house, his wife inexplicably started nagging him and then began to hurl abusive language at him, with words that were unbearable to hear.

Idiomatic_Sent: 你的冰肌玉骨，让我倍感满足。长夜漫漫，我在你身上不停地变换着姿势，享受着你带给我的快乐。感谢这个夏天，让我拥有了你，我亲爱的……凉席。
en_meaning: fair and beautiful skin, delicate and graceful appearance
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '你的冰肌玉骨，让我倍感满足。长夜漫漫，我在你身上不停地变换着姿势，享受着你带给我的快乐。感谢这个夏天，让我拥有了你，我亲爱的……凉席。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Your icy skin and jade-like bones make me feel completely satisfied. In the long night, I keep changing positions on you, enjoying the happiness you bring me. Thank you, this summer has allowed me to have you, my dear... cool mat.
English_Sentence_4o: "Your icy skin and jade-like bones make me feel incredibly satisfied. Throughout the long night, I keep changing positions on you, enjoying the happiness you bring me. Thank you, this summer, for letting me have you, my dear... bamboo mat."

Idiomatic_Sent: 身为军人，为了国家人民，即使战死沙场，马革裹尸也在所不惜。
en_meaning: to die in battle and have one's body wrapped in horsehide
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '身为军人，为了国家人民，即使战死沙场，马革裹尸也在所不惜。'
English_Sentence_3.5: As a soldier, for the country and the people, even if I die on the battlefield, I will not hesitate to be wrapped in horsehide.
English_Sentence_4o: As a soldier, for the sake of the country and its people, even if it means dying on the battlefield and being wrapped in a horsehide, it is a sacrifice worth making.

Idiomatic_Sent: 还有的书评东拼西凑、生拉硬扯、虚美隐恶，本当是属滥出书之类，根本就不值得一评，却为之大肆涂脂抹粉、竭尽奉承。
en_meaning: apply makeup
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '还有的书评东拼西凑、生拉硬扯、虚美隐恶，本当是属滥出书之类，根本就不值得一评，却为之大肆涂脂抹粉、竭尽奉承。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Some book reviews are patched together, forced, and filled with empty praise and hidden flaws, truly belonging to the category of shoddy publications, not even worth a review, yet they are lavishly praised and flattered.
English_Sentence_4o: "Some book reviews are a hodgepodge of unrelated content, forced connections, and flattery that glosses over flaws; they are inherently unworthy of commentary, yet are excessively embellished and filled with sycophantic praise."

Idiomatic_Sent: 兼听则明，偏信则暗，我们要经常保持清醒的头脑。
en_meaning: Blindly believing leads to ignorance
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '兼听则明，偏信则暗，我们要经常保持清醒的头脑。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Listening to both sides will clarify things, but trusting only one side will lead to darkness. We must always keep a clear mind.
English_Sentence_4o: "Listening to all sides brings clarity, while partial belief leads to obscurity; we must always keep a clear mind."

Idiomatic_Sent: 现在看来，他们俩的确是各有所长，综合起来看是平分秋色。
en_meaning: to evenly share the benefits or rewards
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '现在看来，他们俩的确是各有所长，综合起来看是平分秋色。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Now it seems that they both have their own strengths, and when combined, they are evenly matched.
English_Sentence_4o: It appears now that they each have their own strengths, and overall, they are evenly matched.

Idiomatic_Sent: 只有一些生活常识与经验作参考，可想而知要解释这个世界有多困难。实际我对古代的神话、传说不以为然。
en_meaning: not think it is right or acceptable
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '只有一些生活常识与经验作参考，可想而知要解释这个世界有多困难。实际我对古代的神话、传说不以为然。'
English_Sentence_3.5: With only some common sense and experience as reference, it is clear how difficult it is to explain the world. In fact, I do not believe in ancient myths and legends.
English_Sentence_4o: "With only some common sense and experience as a reference, it is imaginable how difficult it is to explain this world. Actually, I am skeptical about ancient myths and legends."

Idiomatic_Sent: 铁证如山，党纪如炬，国法难容，省委重视，举国关注。
en_meaning: irrefutable evidence
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '铁证如山，党纪如炬，国法难容，省委重视，举国关注。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Solid evidence is as towering as a mountain, party discipline is as bright as a torch, national law cannot tolerate, provincial party committee attaches great importance, and the whole country pays attention.
English_Sentence_4o: "Ironclad evidence, party discipline as bright as a torch, intolerable by national law, provincial authorities take it seriously, and the whole country is paying attention."

Idiomatic_Sent: 男人都是要面子的，更何况，康熙可是金口玉言的皇帝，他到时候就算想翻悔可碍于皇帝的威信，恐怕也只能作罢了。
en_meaning: words of great wisdom and authority
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '男人都是要面子的，更何况，康熙可是金口玉言的皇帝，他到时候就算想翻悔可碍于皇帝的威信，恐怕也只能作罢了。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Men are concerned about their reputation, especially considering that Kangxi was a wise emperor; even if he wanted to change his mind later, he would probably be constrained by his reputation as an emperor and have to give up.
English_Sentence_4o: "Men all care about saving face, and moreover, Kangxi was an emperor whose words were as good as gold; even if he wanted to go back on his word, he would probably have to give up due to the authority of the emperor."

Idiomatic_Sent: 我从来就不是个幸运的人，学武学到连盾牌都抗不动，修道又修得天怒人怨，不得以流落中原，穷途潦倒。
en_meaning: being in a state of extreme poverty and despair
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '我从来就不是个幸运的人，学武学到连盾牌都抗不动，修道又修得天怒人怨，不得以流落中原，穷途潦倒。'
English_Sentence_3.5: I have never been a lucky person, unable to even hold up a shield while learning martial arts, angering both heaven and earth with my cultivation, forced to wander in the Central Plains, destitute and miserable.
English_Sentence_4o: I've never been a lucky person; in martial arts, I couldn't even lift a shield, and in Taoist practices, I incurred divine wrath. With no other choice, I ended up wandering in Central Plains, destitute and down on my luck.

Idiomatic_Sent: 奥巴马一直以白宫为阵营为医保方案摇旗呐喊，希望透过这种策略施加最大的压力。
en_meaning: to cheer or shout loudly, often in support of a cause or leader
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '奥巴马一直以白宫为阵营为医保方案摇旗呐喊，希望透过这种策略施加最大的压力。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Obama has always rallied for the White House camp for the healthcare plan, hoping to exert maximum pressure through this strategy.
English_Sentence_4o: "Obama consistently used the White House as his base to vigorously promote the healthcare plan, hoping to exert maximum pressure through this strategy."

Idiomatic_Sent: 一声声叫卖声不绝于耳，街道大呼小叫恣意放纵的人群，周围打铁的声音，卖艺的叫好声无不给这个小镇带来了新鲜的活力。
en_meaning: constantly heard, continuously buzzing in the ears
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '一声声叫卖声不绝于耳，街道大呼小叫恣意放纵的人群，周围打铁的声音，卖艺的叫好声无不给这个小镇带来了新鲜的活力。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The constant cries of vendors, the noisy and unrestrained crowd on the streets, the sound of iron being hammered nearby, and the applause for street performers all bring fresh vitality to this small town.
English_Sentence_4o: "The continuous cries of vendors, the boisterous and carefree crowd in the streets, the clanging of blacksmiths, and the cheers for street performers all brought a fresh vitality to this small town."

Idiomatic_Sent: 他是个身经百战的健将，极有才能。
en_meaning: having experienced many battles or hardships
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '他是个身经百战的健将，极有才能。'
English_Sentence_3.5: He is a seasoned warrior, extremely talented.
English_Sentence_4o: He is a seasoned expert with great talent.

Idiomatic_Sent: 有一种爱是“默默无言”，等你冷了给你披上外衣；有一种爱是“生死相依”，今生注定不离不弃。5.20我爱你日，这种爱今生我最想给的人就是你！
en_meaning: quietly or silently without saying anything
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '有一种爱是“默默无言”，等你冷了给你披上外衣；有一种爱是“生死相依”，今生注定不离不弃。5.20我爱你日，这种爱今生我最想给的人就是你！'
English_Sentence_3.5: There is a love that is "silent and wordless," waiting to cover you with a coat when you are cold; there is a love that is "life and death intertwined," destined to never leave you in this lifetime. On May 20th, the person I most want to give this kind of love to in this lifetime is you!
English_Sentence_4o: There is a kind of love that is "silent and unspoken," putting a coat on you when you are cold; there is a kind of love that is "life and death dependence," destined to never leave or abandon you in this life. On 5.20, I Love You Day, the person I most want to give this kind of love to in this life is you!

Idiomatic_Sent: 寺庙里的建筑雕梁画栋，绚丽多彩，在绿树蓝天白云的影映下，显得非常的漂亮。
en_meaning: colorful and splendid
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '寺庙里的建筑雕梁画栋，绚丽多彩，在绿树蓝天白云的影映下，显得非常的漂亮。'
English_Sentence_3.5: The buildings in the temple are adorned with carved beams and painted rafters, vibrant and colorful, appearing very beautiful in the reflection of green trees, blue sky, and white clouds.
English_Sentence_4o: The buildings in the temple, with their beautifully painted beams and intricate carvings, appear very beautiful against the backdrop of green trees, blue sky, and white clouds.

Idiomatic_Sent: 携月桂一缕香，愿你乐享快乐芬芳；採月华一片霜，愿你荣获好运之光；借月饼一粒糖，愿你将甜蜜品尝。中秋到了，祈月送福，真心朋友情谊长，衷心祝你及你的家人花好月圆人安康，春华秋实家富贵!
en_meaning: an ideal and harmonious state, often used to describe a happy and blissful marriage or life
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '携月桂一缕香，愿你乐享快乐芬芳；採月华一片霜，愿你荣获好运之光；借月饼一粒糖，愿你将甜蜜品尝。中秋到了，祈月送福，真心朋友情谊长，衷心祝你及你的家人花好月圆人安康，春华秋实家富贵!'
English_Sentence_3.5: Carrying a wisp of laurel moon, may you enjoy happiness and fragrance; collecting a piece of moonlight frost, may you receive the light of good luck; borrowing a piece of sugar from the mooncake, may you taste sweetness. Mid-Autumn Festival is here, praying for blessings from the moon, sincere friendship lasts long, sincerely wishing you and your family a happy and prosperous life, with abundance in spring and autumn!
English_Sentence_4o: "Carrying a wisp of laurel fragrance, I wish you the joy of happiness; gathering a slice of moonlight frost, I wish you the light of good fortune; borrowing a bit of mooncake sweetness, I wish you a taste of bliss. Mid-Autumn Festival is here, praying to the moon to send blessings, sincere friends and long-lasting friendship. I wholeheartedly wish you and your family a harmonious and healthy life, and prosperity throughout the seasons!"

Idiomatic_Sent: 当戈尔夫妇，这么一对儿相敬如宾的模范夫妻决定结束他们长达40年的婚姻而不对外公开原因时，虽有古语为训，但外界的猜测还是沸反盈天。
en_meaning: "uproar fills the sky"; "chaotically flying everywhere"; "reaching a boiling point"
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '当戈尔夫妇，这么一对儿相敬如宾的模范夫妻决定结束他们长达40年的婚姻而不对外公开原因时，虽有古语为训，但外界的猜测还是沸反盈天。'
English_Sentence_3.5: When the Golfs, a model couple who treated each other with respect, decided to end their 40-year marriage without publicly disclosing the reason, despite the ancient saying as a lesson, speculation from the outside world still ran rampant.
English_Sentence_4o: When the Gore couple, such a model pair who treated each other with utmost respect, decided to end their 40-year marriage without publicly revealing the reason, despite ancient wisdom advising discretion, outside speculation still ran rampant.

Idiomatic_Sent: 自己有真才实学才是硬道理，光靠跟在领导身边狐假虎威是没有前途的。
en_meaning: actual talent and practical knowledge
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '自己有真才实学才是硬道理，光靠跟在领导身边狐假虎威是没有前途的。'
English_Sentence_3.5: Having genuine talent and solid knowledge is the true way to succeed, relying solely on following the leader to exert power is a dead end.
English_Sentence_4o: "Having genuine talent and knowledge is the real deal; merely relying on following the leader and bluffing is not going to lead to a bright future."

Idiomatic_Sent: ——在吉野单纯又热血的心中，事业和媳妇儿已经牢牢的联系在一起了。这孩子没那么复杂的逻辑思维，他只能在事业和媳妇儿中间划一道长长的等号，然后默默的向事业这个目标奋力前进，即使已经头破血流都只会目视前方，永不停步。 #淮上#
en_meaning: head broken and blood flowing; suffering severe injuries
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '——在吉野单纯又热血的心中，事业和媳妇儿已经牢牢的联系在一起了。这孩子没那么复杂的逻辑思维，他只能在事业和媳妇儿中间划一道长长的等号，然后默默的向事业这个目标奋力前进，即使已经头破血流都只会目视前方，永不停步。 #淮上#'
English_Sentence_3.5: In Yoshino's pure and passionate heart, career and wife are already firmly linked together. This child doesn't have such complex logical thinking, he can only draw a long equal sign between career and wife, and then silently strive towards the goal of career, even if he is already battered and bruised, he will only keep his eyes on the front and never stop. #Huai Shang#
English_Sentence_4o: In Yoshino's pure and passionate heart, career and wife are already firmly linked together. This child doesn't have such complex logical thinking; he can only draw a long equals sign between career and wife, and then silently strive towards the goal of career, never stopping even if he is already battered and bleeding. #HuaiShang#

Idiomatic_Sent: 有生之年，狭路相逢，终究不能幸免。无论时光停留在哪一处，只要我遇见你，兜兜转转，总是会爱上你。我不求长生，不求功名，我只想在最后的最后，当家国平安，当岁月静好，能和你在一起，永世不离。 #许维夏#
en_meaning: within one's lifetime
translation_instruction: Translate this sentence to English: '有生之年，狭路相逢，终究不能幸免。无论时光停留在哪一处，只要我遇见你，兜兜转转，总是会爱上你。我不求长生，不求功名，我只想在最后的最后，当家国平安，当岁月静好，能和你在一起，永世不离。 #许维夏#'
English_Sentence_3.5: In this lifetime, meeting at a narrow path, ultimately cannot escape. No matter where time stops, as long as I meet you, wandering around, I will always fall in love with you. I do not seek immortality, nor fame and fortune, I only wish that in the end, when the country is peaceful and the years are good, I can be with you, never to part. #Xu Wei Xia#
English_Sentence_4o: In this lifetime, if we meet on a narrow path, we cannot escape our fate. No matter where time stops, as long as I encounter you, through all the twists and turns, I will always fall in love with you. I do not seek immortality or fame; I only wish that in the end, when our country is at peace and the years are serene, I can be with you, never to part. #Xu Weixia#

Idiomatic_Sent: 凌教授满腹经纶，博古通今，学贯中西，年纪轻轻就功成名就了。
